Mars is a backwater province relative to Earth. Phobos and Deimos are backwater provinces relative to Mars. Phobos is a natural satellite of Mars, a transfer station on the way to the Outer System. Its surface, dotted with craters and cracks, is home to transport hubs, warehouse systems, a mining factory, and even a small colony Hypnos-2. It is a meeting place for many corporations and factions of the Outer System, whose agents cannot afford sufficient cover to infiltrate the Intercity.

Phobos is too cosmopolitan for the Inner System. And it is not difficult to find a recruiter for the Civil Resistance or the pirates of the Unchained Belt here.

Natural satellite of Mars, transfer station on the way to the Outer System.
Start of development: 2050s.
Main contributors to development: RealWare, Grasshopper Technologies.
Security status: not entirely safe.

Mars is a backwater province relative to Earth. Phobos and Deimos are backwater provinces relative to Mars. Deimos is a natural satellite of Mars, a shadow port on the edge of the Inner System. Here you can meet not only pirates and other public enemies, but also corporate agents who want to infiltrate the factions of the Outer System. Deimos is not just a "forge of evil". Here, hidden from the eyes of corporations, new independent ideas are born.

Deimos is like a spider waiting for its prey: quiet, inconspicuous, dangerous. Its venom is quite capable of harming the Inner System.

Natural satellite of Mars, shadow port on the border of the Inner System.
Start of exploration: 2050s.
Main contributors to development: RealWare, PlanetBridge.
Security status: not entirely safe.

The largest asteroid in the Main Belt. Settlements on Ceres appeared even before the Great Anarchist Revolution (GAR). The asteroid is not only rich in valuable ores, but also serves as a launch pad for mining expeditions throughout the Main Belt. Epitoma Colony and Eos station compete for the title of the capital of Ceres. Both houses offices and other buildings of corporations operating on the border of the Outer and Inner Systems. Many stations are located inside the asteroid, and several inhabited settlements revolve around it.

Also not far from Ceres, the artificial planet Wernher moves at a synchronized speed.

The largest asteroid of the Main Belt, a major trading port.
Start of development: 2070s.
Main contribution to development: Dilthey, Hive, PlanetBridge, CoreWard MG and minor contributions from the old states of the Earth.

Wernher is a unique construction, built during the Great Anarchic Revolution (GAR) by the Dilthey corporation. An artificial planet, placed in the Main Belt in such a way as to move in orbit at a constant distance from Ceres. For about 40 years after its construction, Wernher was Dilthey's base, capable of moving throughout the System and taking part in the corporation's major construction projects: it participated in the capture and delivery of Geist to a new orbit, and was also a construction base for the construction of HAVOC buildings.

Wernher is now placed in a permanent orbit in the Main Belt, and its cubecentric engines have gone out forever. It contains three stations that have been converted into freely sold assets.

Artificial planet, the largest man-made object in the System.
Average distance to Sun: 2.8 AU
Year of creation: 2117.
Creator: Dilthey.

Vesta constantly changes its status in trade and transport catalogs. Today it is called the largest asteroid in the System, and tomorrow it already lays claim to the title of the tiniest dwarf planet. However, these metamorphoses pale in comparison to the true value of Vesta - endless reserves of minerals, which attracted the attention of corporations to the asteroid almost immediately after the invention of the cubecentric engine. Now Vesta is cut through by kilometers of underground mines, many of which have long been abandoned. Their tunnels go into the depths of its mineral heart.

If you are lucky enough to stumble upon a feral tribe of cannibals who have long forgotten that they live in space, do not be surprised: in the dark abandoned labyrinths of the mines, time flows by its own laws. People who are born, live, and die here are not very similar to earthlings.

A large Main Belt asteroid, a cluster of resource extraction facilities.
Start of development: 2100s.
Main contributors to development: CoreWard MG, Daydream Chem.

A remote province of the Main Belt. Some consider life on Pallas to be hard and a major failure, while others, looking at events in the rest of the System, consider it rather a quiet one. However, with the onset of 2200, even the most remote corners of the System were affected by a new redistribution of property. Pallas is similar to a gray stone both on the outside and in the feel of life here. People live a simple life, mining minerals and standing in huge lines after the arrival of food transporters.

At one time, Pallas was developed by the Hive corporation, and the asteroid actually became its property. After the liquidation of the corporation, Pallas was of no use to anyone until platinum deposits were accidentally discovered under a small methane mine.

Large Main Belt asteroid, auxiliary stations and mining facility.
Start of development: 2110s.
Main contributors to development: Hive.

Geist is a ghost asteroid. It was extremely difficult to detect due to its orbit, speed, albedo, and other factors. However, the Dilthey corporation caught Geist and, using powerful cubecentric engines, changed its orbit so that the large asteroid became a transit point in the Main Belt. Beneath the surface of Geist are three colony stations. One of them even has a real city park. It is not only a transit point connecting the Outer and Inner parts of the System, but also a hub for legal activity in the Belt.

One of the stations is held by Dilthey. It is the headquarters of the corporation after the Wernher stations were transferred for free sale. The other two change hands depending on the fluctuations of the dignitas in the ancap system.

Caught asteroid, brought into the Main Belt, space city complex.
Average distance to Sun: 3 AU
Year of creation: 2180.
Creator: Dilthey.

An aluminosilicate-rich Main Belt asteroid that was never destined to become a mining center. Unless you count the occasional desperate group of miners who, in a mad attempt to get rich, land in a random spot on Interamnia and try to collect as many stones as possible. The thing is, Interamnia is in eternal conflict. It is home to the largest and most open station owned by the public enemies — the space pirates. The city of Hargeysa is the Tortuga of the 23rd century.

Why hasn't RealWare nuked Interamnia yet? It's convenient for corporations to have a free zone where undercover agents can do business outside the ancap system.

A large asteroid of the Main Belt, a pirate base and a shadow port.
Start of development: unknown.
Main contributors to development: public enemies.
Security status: extremely unsafe.

A small asteroid in the Main Belt that attracted the attention of the Civil Resistance due to its unremarkable nature. It was here that the colnodes delivered the quasimorph with whom they made the Alliance Pact.
Main base of the Civil Resistance

The largest planet in the solar system, the fifth in distance from the sun. Along with Saturn, Jupiter is classified as a gas giant. The planet has been known to people since ancient times, which is reflected in the mythology and religious beliefs of various cultures: Mesopotamian, Babylonian, Greek and others. The modern name of Jupiter comes from the name of the ancient Roman supreme god of thunder.

A moon of Jupiter, the closest of the four Galilean moons to the planet. Named in honor of the mythological Io - the priestess of Hera and the beloved of Zeus. It has a diameter of 3642 km, which makes it the fourth largest satellite in the solar system.

The sixth-most distant moon of Jupiter, the smallest of the four Galilean moons. Discovered in 1610 by Galileo Galilei and probably by Simon Marius at the same time. Over the centuries, more and more comprehensive observations were made of Europe with the help of telescopes, and, starting from the seventies of the twentieth century, by spacecraft flying near.

One of the Galilean satellites of Jupiter, the seventh in distance from it among all its satellites and the largest satellite in the solar system. Its diameter is 5268 kilometers, which is 2% larger than that of Titan (the second largest satellite in the solar system) and 8% larger than that of Mercury.

The second largest satellite of Jupiter (after Ganymede), one of the four Galilean satellites and the most distant among them from the planet. It is the third largest moon in the solar system after Ganymede and Titan.

The sixth planet in terms of distance from the Sun and the second largest planet in the solar system after Jupiter. Saturn is classified as a gas giant planet. Saturn is named after the Roman god of agriculture.

Satellite of Saturn, discovered September 17, 1789 by William Herschel. Named after Mimas, one of the titans of Greek mythology. Also referred to as Saturn I. With a diameter of 396 kilometers, it is the twentieth largest satellite in the solar system, as well as the smallest known cosmic body that has a rounded shape due to its own gravity.

The sixth largest satellite of Saturn and the fourteenth farthest from it among the 82 known satellites. Referred to as Saturn II. It is the seventeenth largest satellite in the solar system. It was discovered in 1789 by William Herschel, but remained little studied until the early 1980s, when two Voyager interplanetary probes approached it.

The fifth largest and most massive moon of Saturn and the fifteenth largest from the planet. This is a medium-sized satellite, its diameter is about 1060 km. Tethys was discovered by Giovanni Cassini in 1684 and was named after one of the Titanides of Greek mythology. The apparent magnitude of Tethys is 10.2.
The fourth largest satellite of Saturn and the fourth farthest from the planet among the seven largest satellites of the latter. It is the fifteenth largest and largest satellite in the solar system.

A steel and titanium monster that orbits high above Mercury. Its two halves, once independent spacecrafts, are held together by a bulky, asymmetrical structure designed to withstand the unpredictable gravitational forces and solar winds. Vulcan houses three stations.

With its lead-gray hull and observation windows that gleam in the reflection of the Sun, Vulcan is reminiscent of the early years of active exploration of the Solar System. The noise of power reactors penetrates every corner, and the vibration of the hull is the musical theme for the satellite's inhabitants.

An artificial satellite of Mercury, constructed from old spacecrafts.
Altitude above Mercury: 120 Mm.
Year of creation: 2132.
Creators: Dilthey, PlanetBridge.

Citadel-1 is an artificial satellite of Mercury. Tianming Corporation installed cubecentric engines on the trans-Neptunian object and launched it into Mercury's orbit. After the asteroid was delivered to its permanent location, a habitable ring was built around it along the minor axis. After that, Citadel-1 was spun at such a speed that the Coriolis force could replace gravity for people. Four of the five Citadel-1 stations are located in the habitable ring. However, the Gamma Hydra 4 station is located inside the asteroid itself. Tianming was a pioneer in asteroid catching.

Citadel-1 is an old complex, and lacks the amenities found on HAVOC or Geist.

An artificial satellite of Mercury, made from a captured asteroid.
Altitude above Mercury: 350 Mm.
Year of creation: 2102
Creator: Tianming.

HAVOC — High Altitude Venusian Orbital City. This is an extremely successful project of the Dilthey corporation. Caught beyond the orbit of Neptune, the asteroid was delivered to the orbit of Venus. The asteroid served as a framework for an arcology — a city with a closed ecological system designed by the Italian philosopher and architect Paolo Soleri. The training station Blade at the Ready is located outside the arcology, under the surface of the asteroid.

All those lucky enough to live on stations of HAVOC can enjoy the latest technologies in arranging space dwellings. Dilthey seems not to notice the shortage of resources and the growing tension and lives in a real anarcho-capitalist paradise.

An artificial satellite of Venus, made from a captured asteroid.
Altitude above Venus: 120 Mm.
Year of creation: 2192.
Creator: Dilthey.

Once upon a time, the USSR launched a tiny artificial planet called Mechta (Dream) towards the Sun. About a hundred years ago, Venus pulled Dream towards itself, and it became its artificial satellite. During the terraforming of Venus, Mechta became a convenient place for assembling structures and a loading terminal for planetary shuttles. Garbage was thrown next to Mechta, mechanisms were attached to it - and forgotten about. As a result, Mechta became a huge improvised engineering art object and a surprise to everyone in the System.

Over time, the size of Mechta became so large that stations began to be placed on it.

An artificial satellite of Venus made from space debris, which is only growing in size every year.
Height above Venus: variable.
Year of creation: 1959, the launch of the Luna-1 station.
Creator: USSR and various corporations.

A large artificial Earth satellite. Tsiolkovsky consists of a robust central structure (CS), an automatic orbit maintenance system, and five stations located in different places of the CS. Tsiolkovsky was supposed to be a transport hub, a gateway to Earth. At the same time, it was supposed to be connected to the surface by a space elevator. So far, these plans have not been realized, since no corporation has the resources for such an ambitious project.

For a long time, it was not customary to initiate direct actions on Tsiolkovsky, as well as in Earth orbit. But in the last decade and a half, hostilities have begun at the Tsiolkovsky station. When they reach Earth is a matter of time.

An artificial Earth satellite, a wonder of orbital engineering.
Created: 2120, the 20th anniversary of the GAR.
Creators: Hexarchy Corporations.
Station Control Terminal. Allows you to locate objects, personnel or elevator.
Autonomous healing station for health restoration. Requires charging to use.
A simple table with a minimum of necessary tools to create simple objects.
Industrial equipment for the production of complex items.
Equipment for quickly printing small simple items.
Industrial equipment for the production of medical items.
A massive moving platform that allows you to move between the levels of the station.
Heating unit for cooking. Has a built-in oven.
A typical sealed door, controlled by a compact remote control, can be locked
Residential doors are functionally similar to the rest of the doors, but they look more elegant
A stone door capable of smoothly opening and closing when touched.
A multi-purpose small spacecraft that allows you to freely move over short distances in space and enter the atmosphere of planets.
Madness is reflected in the eyes of this creature, he is ready to fight even with his bare hands.
A former station employee, turned by quasimorphosis into a possessed madman, thirsty for murder.
This doctor is out of his mind. He has a crazy smile and is foaming at the mouth. The unfortunate victim of quasimorphosis.
This woman was an R&D employee, but the quasimorphosis irreversibly twisted her mind.
The eyes of this man afflicted by quasimorphosis are empty. He is going to kill anyone even barehanded.
This is the same as you, an operative of some PMC. The only difference is that he works for someone else. There are no other differences.
This is the same as you, an operative of some PMC. The only difference is that she works for someone else. There are no other differences.
This is a weird quasimorphic creature. It will make your blood run cold. More research is required.
By certain signs, you can understand that this swollen mass used to be a man.
Quasimorphosis twisted the body of this man no less than the mind. His swollen arm throbs menacingly.
This creature is a GMO organism created to balance the ecology of Venus. It turned out that quasimorphosis affects them too.
Twisted and distorted human body without skin.
A Quasimorph resembling a hybrid of a spider and a human. It is believed to be the commander-in-chief and overseer of rituals in the army of Tezctlan.

Xiomara was the free hierarch of the Venusian bramfatura. She was a spirit of freedom. Her knightly order war Order of Spider. After the return of Tezctlan, she rejects his idea of Emerald empire. There is only one empire in the Solar System, long lost Red-Gold Empire of Sun. Xiomara believes that Gannix is the Land of the Free. She can agree the position of chieftain for Tezctlan, the position of first among equals. But she will wage war against any self-proclaimed emperor of Gannix.
Member of the elite PMC Tifton
Disgusting product of genetic modifications on organisms from Earth
This quasimorph is both intelligent and fierce. Its behavior reflects not only strength, agility, and a readiness to kill but also some level of cunning. There is even a hint of pride.
This quasimorph looks like it was designed for battle. These creatures cannot have a normal metabolism. No amount of energy would be enough to sustain this death machine.
The equipment of this quasimorph resembles ceremonial attire. Everything suggests that the society of Venus' Bramfatura is similar to some ancient human societies.
The life of this quasimorph is eternal torment. Let's hope that the marginal theories about the reincarnation of humans after death in Bramfaturas are just theories.
If the clothing of quasimorphs speaks volumes, this one clearly holds a high rank in the hierarchy.
Judging by its attire and weaponry, this creature is undoubtedly a warrior.
Stationary 7.97 caliber machine gun with automated targeting system. Try your best not to be in its line of fire.
A stationary automatic flamethrower with a homing system. Try not to be in the line of fire.
A stationary laser gun with a homing system. Try not to be in the line of fire.

Workers are the backbone of corporate wealth. They are the labor army that the Civil Resistance relies on to move freely through the System. However, the workers are deprived of their will and work for a piece of bread and a residential barrel in a capsule hotel.

Workers are the backbone of corporate wealth. They are the labor army that the Civil Resistance relies on to move freely through the System. However, the workers are deprived of their will and work for a piece of bread and a residential barrel in a capsule hotel.

The AnCom security service is very different from other corporate security services. Calling themselves Inquisitors, these specialists are armed with advanced technology that has no analogs in the System.

The AnCom security service is very different from other corporate security services. Calling themselves Inquisitors, these specialists are armed with advanced technology that has no analogs in the System.

Autonomous robot. A service machine that is used by corporations where living workers cannot be used. Robots are more expensive than humans, so corporations that care about profit margins only use them where it's necessary.
An unfortunate creature of the Bramfatura of the Moon who would rather die than live. But life is his punishment.
A minor Quasimorph of Duggur. A faithful servant of his dark masters.
A grim warrior of the dark and mysterious Bramfatura of the Moon.
A sedentary Quasimorph that is extremely hard to kill. The nightmarish creation of the surreal hell of Duggur.
A powerful Quasimorph of Duggur, leading his faithful servants into battle.
A faithful slave of the major Quasimorphs of Shartamakhum, ready to serve his masters in war.
A flying head of the most nightmarish visage. Messenger of Shartamakhum, who sows death in physical reality.
A quasimorph, ready to accept death with laughter for the glory of Shartamakhum.
This creature is reminiscent of genies from ancient earth legends. Truly, Shartamakhum is a mysterious and deadly Bramfatura.
Low-wage workers make up the largest group of employees in mining or production plants.
Low-wage workers make up the largest group of employees in mining or production plants.
A member of the managerial class, perhaps even the CEO of this station.

Realware organizes his internal security forces on the basis of small task forces with access to absolutely any known weapon.

A high-level manager who has undergone expensive training on Earth. Is our goal.

A monster from the depths of the Bramfatura of Venus. One of the loyal warlords of Tezctlan.
A translucent astral body capable of dealing physical damage. Despite its ghostly nature, the copy's strike is tangible and destructive.

One of the leaders of the strange organization Civil Resistance, seeking to restore the former order of a long-vanished era.
Veteran and commander of military forces in the service of corporations.
A Civil Resistance Forces combat unit.
A Civil Resistance Forces combat unit.

A Warhead-class autonomous robot (AR) is an AI-driven humanoid robot specialised for close combat in space-station facilities. They play a prominent role in Solar System: many rich corporations use "warhs" as integral part of its security system. Warhead-class is one among numerous other types of battle robots. It is the original model of the RealWare corporation and most common type of ARs in the System.

A Sheila-class autonomous robot (AR) is an AI-driven humanoid robot specialised for your pleasure only. Please contact your local distributor for brand of recommended lube. We wish you the best rest with your best purchase.
Libator or "hellcrab" is the royal gavvakh collector and the royal fleshfinder. Libators are known as dull and vicious servants of Tyrant among other eannis (quasimorphs of Ur the Restored).

Gallu is quasimorph of Ur the Restored that serve to defend the bramfatura of Mars at any cost. They look like enormous-size insects but inside many asymmetrical eyes there is the glow of hatred and strange intelligence.

A shrill in the depths, a chant of a fleshy mass, and suddenly you're face to face with a horrifying being of ash and red sand. Armored mask stares at you with a perpetual tension, and another shrill explodes from its tapered mouth in a show of force. Welcome to the Ur the Restored and its guardians greet you.

Barakunarashes are quasimorphs that drag unfortunate victims into the deep layers of the bramfatura of Mars. Aristocrats of Ur were one of million of the offspring of Urparp. Now they all are disinherited and fight for the attention of resurrected Tyrant.
A madman who worships Gannix's quasimorphs as gods
A madwoman who worships Gannix's quasimorphs as gods
The chief of a mad cult formed due to quasimorphosis
The chief of a mad cult formed due to quasimorphosis

Once a white collar, raised by fate on position to control others. Now he is just a regular member of an insane cult that arose under the influence of quasimorphosis.

Low-skilled corporate security specialist. It is not even known whether his mind is possessed by quasimorphosis or whether he joined the cult voluntarily.

Trained corporate security specialist. Such people are accustomed to violence without any possession. Now their hatred just multiplied.

Urparp is The Principle of Form. Tyrant of Ur. Among his titles, there is: great implementer of the Plan. Xiomara doesn't talk much about Urparp. But from her words it becomes clear that he serves at the same time as an object of worship for the quasimorphs of Ur, a bogy for quasimorphs of other bramfaturas, and for some as yet unknown power inside the Sun, he is only something like a pet.
RealWare uses labor armies of its facilities. Their workers are subject to the same command system as their Security Service. The labor trooper is the lowest and most powerless working unit.

Ordinary worker bee of PlanetBridge. They dig tunnels inside the asteroids of the Belt, build stations in the orbits of the planets of the Outer System, and can re-calibrate the engine on the fly.

First level of work at Grasshopper Technologies. Even if you have enough dignitas to graduate from a prestigious school, when you come to work at Grasshopper, you must work as an journeyman for at least a year.

The rank and file of the Franche-Comte PS Security Service work both as prison guards and as security officers. Always tired, dissatisfied with their work as guards, they perceive any shootout as entertainment.

Grasshopper Technologies organizes a competition among employees to move to Security Service. This allows them to call their security service the only voluntary security service in the System.

Sunlight Coven staffs their Security Service with employees, on whom they can spend the least dignitas. These are soldiers fired from previous jobs, deserters, former pirates, and so on.

The strongest and bravest RealWare combatants get access to the best weapons and can prove themselves on the battlefield to the greatest benefit of the employer.

Heavily armed Daydream Chems combatant. Their slogan: “Everything ahead of us is fleeing, behind us everything is burning”.

The PlanetBridge Security Service heavy combatants are trained to fight in outer space. If necessary and in sufficient numbers they can dismantle an enemy interplanetary spacecraft.

Well-trained prison guards of Franche-Comte PS. They are very dangerous in the cramped corridors of space stations where they feel right at home.

HASS stands for Heavily-Armed Security Specialist. Miners who have walked kilometers through tunnels under the surface of the planets of the Solar System take putting on military gear and being sent into battle as a vacation.

Colnode who was given the most powerful weapon available and sent to die for the ideas of the Revolution.

When the time comes to gather the harvest, Tezctlan calls the Tlamacazqui. The High Priest of Gannix can slay a quasimorph without losing even a drop of gavvakh. Now that Gannix has pierced the human world, Tlamacazqui can store not just pitiful crumbs, but fill bottomless vessels with human energy.
The lowest position on pirate spacecrafts. Rough work and cannon fodder during boarding.

From the outside appearance of pirate spacecrafts, you wouldn't know that anyone was maintaining them, but it is the technicians who don't let them break apart into pieces.

Making sure everyone does their job and providing them with what they need is the main job of the Quartermaster on a spacecraft.

The most important person on the spacecraft if someone needs to cut something off.

Not every pirate can rise to the rank of boatswain, but the best weapons and a high percentage of the share in the division of the loot are worth it.

Supercomputers are responsible for plotting a course, so this title only means belonging to the pirate combat elite.

An instrument for eradicating all who stand in the way. Their arsenal and skills exceeded human capabilities.

He knows how to extract suffering from every blow, reducing opponents to trembling shadows of their former selves.

The special military robot of the RealWare Corporation.
If you want to work at Dilthey, you are obliged to work as an assistant. Only after some time (and having passed the security check) you will be able to move up to a higher position.

Their job is to control and adjust the actions of combat forces. They have the necessary combat skills to not only observe the battlefield, but also to intervene at key moments.

The servant of Kattaram, staying in the eternal sleep. It carries out all orders with a blend of strange passivity and mysterious cunning.
Knight of Kattaram, knighted by Morax himself. Eternal guardian of the borders between varying kinds of inexistence.
Barons of Kattaram are boulders around the throne of Morax. Each time matter could no longer become denser, a new thanarak is born.
Small and swift servants of Ron execute all commands of cruel aknaraks and barounazes. They also keep the knowledge of the bramfatura.
The knights of Ron are clots of metamatter of hatred. Hatred has polished their form, and now aknaraks can and wish only to kill.
Barounazes of Ron are gatherers of the shards of metamatters breaking off from other bramfaturas when they are shaken by catastrophes.
The keeper of the prison walls of Scrivnus. His essence is so deeply intertwined with the essence of the prison that he literally cannot comprehend what freedom means.
The knight of Scrivnus — jailer and personal tormentor. Tarkaores do not fight to protect their bramfatura’s essence. They battle for the right to guard the eternal prison.
The baron of Scrivnus, one of the rulers of the Great Prison where captives endlessly wrestle against their own consciousness.

Great and Accepted Knight of Gannix. Poisonous warrior of Tezctlan. No one knows why he is called "the poisonous one." However, Gannix has its own rules. What is poisonous in the army of Tezctlan might just be toxic in the physical reality.
The contract has already been signed
Break the contract with the Quasimorph

<color=#FFFEC1>Recruit</color>, welcome to <color=#FFFEC1>Rogue City</color>! This station was the tool of thieving vampires, sucking the juices from the free people of the <color=#FFFEC1>Solar System</color>. It is now turned to the benefit of the working people. You made the right choice when you decided to leave your employer and then get to the nearest <color=#FFFEC1>Civilian Resistance</color> base by any means necessary. No more corporate slavery! You are to go through reintegration into organized society. Soon you will become a <color=#FFFEC1>citizen</color> again. Right now you need to go to the training class, where you will gradually start to learn what it means to become a full member of the <color=#FFFEC1>Civil Resistance</color>. I welcome you and thank you for making the right choice. <color=#FFFEC1>Issahar</color>.

<color=#FFFEC1>Issahar</color>, you should start showing results in the <color=#FFFEC1>Internal System</color> as soon as possible. You are conducting open combat operations, sacrificing many of our <color=#FFFEC1>colnodes</color> that could be useful to us at <color=#FFFEC1>Saturn</color> or in our business at transneptunian sites. You promised to strike a sensitive blow to <color=#FFFEC1>RealWare</color> and reveal the truth about <color=#FFFEC1>AnCom</color>. But you did not strike <color=#FFFEC1>RealWare</color>, and your theory about <color=#FFFEC1>AnCom</color> may be incorrect. You must conduct an immediate review of the rational use of resources in your sector. <color=#FFFEC1>Lia</color>.

<color=#FFFEC1>Rogue City</color> is secure enough to prepare messages for routing into the <color=#FFFEC1>External System</color>. I have successfully infiltrated <color=#FFFEC1>L-BSA</color> as a security guard. Some time ago, there was an attack here by <color=#FFFEC1>HIS "Magnum"</color> to extract some important prisoner. I managed to establish that <color=#FFFEC1>HIS</color> acted as contractors for <color=#FFFEC1>AnCom</color>. The chances that my theory is correct have sharply increased. <color=#FFFEC1>AnCom</color> is more than just a publisher. Unfortunately, <color=#FFFEC1>L-BSA</color> is now open to attack, and its owners will change. I'm not sure if I can continue to provide relevant information. <color=#FFFEC1>Issahar</color>.

<color=#FFFEC1>Issahar</color>, your demand for more <color=#FFFEC1>Colnodes</color> is outrageous. You work within the <color=#FFFEC1>Internal System</color>. You have <color=#FFFEC1>Mars</color> at your disposal! You need to manage with available resources and focus on recruitment. <color=#FFFEC1>Issahar</color>, your recent behavior is causing concern. Perhaps too many <color=#FFFEC1>Colnodes</color> can lead to disintegration of <color=#FFFEC1>personality</color>. We will conduct the appropriate research. Remember that the social must always prevail over the personal. <color=#FFFEC1>Lia</color>.

The number of counter-intelligence agents in the streets of RealWare<color=#FFFEC1>InterCity</color> is extremely high, my <color=#FFFEC1>colnodes</color> are constantly at risk of being exposed. From now on, I'm going to keep one bullet in <color=#FFFEC1>Liberator</color> for myself. The risk of our secrets falling into the hands of <color=#FFFEC1>RealWare</color> is not justified. Especially since this is not our priority target in the <color=#FFFEC1>Internal System</color>. <color=#FFFEC1>Issahar</color>.

Station Zero, Manning analysis. From this point it is worth starting a report of a systematic study of quasimorphosis. The important part: “No pathogens were isolated from the group. No bacteria, viruses, fungi, or higher parasites. I know for sure that hormonal imbalances are a consequence of their madness and not the cause. None of those interrogated could describe the reasons why they decided to join the cult. Even the organizers say that this idea just came to them. Some patients report whispers from another world. The phenomenon has no physical cause. But there is a physical effect. I propose to call this phenomenon quasimorphosis.” Learn by heart.

Dr. Eipschwitz.

Why don't we find alive beings in phased buildings? Expedition Sector Louhi-XV: Dr. Peabody has confirmed that Object 0-177C is a sarcophagus. Very similar to a Nahua sarcophagus. Moreover, Peabody insisted that it was sealed as if the funeral rites had already been completed. But the sarcophagus is empty. Where should we look for quasimorphs?

Dr. Eipschwitz.

Eccollapse. It is the answer to my question. Hypothesis: phasing - transition of inanimate objects from pleroma to kenoma; eccollapse - the transition of living objects from pleroma to kenoma. Does this mean that quasimorphs are in some sense "living objects"?

Dr. Eipschwitz.

Project Dislocator Note: If my theory of movement into the pleroma is correct, can I return Tifton combatants back without eccolapse? It will be funny to watch how the mercenaries get back into the kenoma through the bodies of people.

Additional: talk to the authorities about buying prisoners in L-BSA.

Does the existence of phased sarcophagi means that quasimorphs "die" in their bramfaturas? Maybe my hypothesis was wrong from the very beginning. It is necessary to immediately request from Peabody an array of hypotheses about the possible purpose of objects of type 0-177C other than funeral ones.

Dr. Eipschwitz.

The deciphering of stone R-98-21 is progressing. The Knorozov tables still fit after transposition. An analytical analysis of the result is next. From what catches the eye, the Silver Orb is mentioned there. Сosmography of its location relative to Venus shows that it may be Earth.

Dr. Eipschwitz.

The report was sent to Fresco's board of directors. Now they will definitely finance my project on Mercury. However, I can't wait to see what the corporate intelligence officers bring back from Earth. I hope Interdict will not interfere, and the cargo will arrive on time.

Dr. Eipschwitz.

I hope the archive ends up in good hands. I am removing the security levels available to me from Dr. Eipschwitz's personal journal. These... Beings... They are already appearing on the streets of Oddibjord-3. Better death than going through what happened to the guys... The last thing I can do is make the texts of this monster public. The communication channel with SBN is not working. The texts will be in the terminals, I hope sooner or later the one who will save humanity will get to them.

Archivist, Randall Baranov, Star-4 access.

Quasimorphs are not even energy, they are a completely new type of existence. I believe that by moving to Earth they must have either acquired a body without eccolapse or somehow become attached to a material object. My research on the Dislocator will already allow me to create a prototype of a quasimorphic detector. I think I won’t be mistaken if I propose to the management to send a reconnaissance group to Mexico City or another altepetl.

Dr. Eipschwitz.

<color=#FFFEC1>Gad</color>, I express my gratitude for your help in <color=#FFFEC1>The Internal System</color>. You carried out Operation Gilead brilliantly. Please, maintain control of <color=#FFFEC1>Flat Obsidian</color> for at least a little while longer. Sending data about <color=#FFFEC1>the Device</color> over the Network is prohibited. Send a courier. <color=#FFFEC1>Issachar</color>

<color=#FFFEC1>Issachar</color>, how can you say that HIS of <color=#FFFEC1>AnCom</color> corporation is not monitoring Venus for the purpose of reselling information, but is somehow exercising control over the Invasion ? Your theory from here, from the core of the System, looks even less reliable than from the rings of Saturn. <color=#FFFEC1>Gad</color>

The courier has arrived in <color=#FFFEC1>Rogue City</color>. I'm working with data. I ask you to assist me on Mercury for at least some more time. I look forward to your cooperation, <color=#FFFEC1>Gad</color>. <color=#FFFEC1>Issachar</color>

Leave Mercury immediately and return to <color=#FFFEC1>Saturn</color>. <color=#FFFEC1>Issachar</color> has no authority to give you orders, <color=#FFFEC1>Gad</color>. We are aware of <color=#FFFEC1>the Device</color>. Immediately deconstruct it and take with you all the components that you consider significant for analysis. <color=#FFFEC1>Lia</color>

I've intercepted the message from <color=#FFFEC1>the Council</color>. Don't ask questions. <color=#FFFEC1>Gad</color>, I ask you to trust me. We will be able to use the <color=#FFFEC1>Dislocator</color> to fight the Regime. Stay on <color=#FFFEC1>Mercury</color>, I'll think of something soon. <color=#FFFEC1>Issachar</color>

Say <color=#FFFEC1>the Emerald Word</color> and you will live forever under the banner of the green shine. If you refuse I will send my slaves to you to extinguish your sick consciousness forever. <color=#FFFEC1>Tezctlan</color>

<color=#FFFEC1>Issachar</color>, you should make a decision as soon as possible. Quasimorphic distortions occur in the communication systems. In addition there are signs of bearing <color=#FFFEC1>Flat Obsidian</color> from HIS without a corporate transponder. <color=#FFFEC1>Gad</color>

If you do not immediately leave <color=#FFFEC1>Mercury</color> then <color=#FFFEC1>the Council</color> will raise the question of declaring you and <color=#FFFEC1>comrade Issachar</color> renegades. Your help is objectively needed on <color=#FFFEC1>Saturn</color>. Stop testing the patience of <color=#FFFEC1>the Council</color>, <color=#FFFEC1>Gad</color>. <color=#FFFEC1>Lia</color>

To the new king who received the kingdom from Tezctlan. The Orders transfer power to you until Tezctlan returns from the pilgrimage to the Silver Orb. You are bound by the oaths of Jaguar, Eagle, Python, and the rest of the free inhabitants of Gannix. We wait and believe that the hylonaut (traveller to earth - footnote by Eipschwitz) will return and again take the Emerald Kingdom into his hands.

Before the Reaper of the Harvest, I answer to the Orders, Marquis Decarabia, renounce the honor of waiting for Tezctlan on the obsidian throne. May Gannix live for an eon without a king. Free orders under the glow of the red-golden eye of Gagtungr.

No one has ever returned from the Silver Orb. We don't know how Tezctlan will be regained.

Report date 993008. The inability to take a sample from <color=#FFFEC1>the Monolith</color> forces us to work with it holistically. We are now testing the assumption that this is a <color=#FFFEC1>quasimorph</color>. Second hypothesis: the existence of a quasimorph on <color=#FFFEC1>Mars</color> means that there is still a <color=#FFFEC1>bramfatura</color> here, but it is much more hidden than the others. On the other hand, if all the quasimorphs of this bramfatura are as inert as the Monolith, then there may already be many of them around us, but we mistake them for the natural structures of Mars. <color=#FFFEC1>Dr. Dennett</color>

Report date 991009. No radiography of <color=#FFFEC1>the Monolith</color> gives clear results. At this point, one thing can be said: the Monolith does not come from our world. Perhaps it was brought here from another planet after <color=#FFFEC1>phasing</color> there. Or <color=#FFFEC1>Mars</color> has a hidden <color=#FFFEC1>bramfatura</color>. Third hypothesis: Mars <color=#FFFEC1>had</color> bramfatura and the Monolith phased before it disappeared. Corollary: bramfaturas may disappear. Hypothesis to be tested: whether bramfaturas can occur. <color=#FFFEC1>Dr. Dennett</color>

Report date 992109. A report for the management has been generated and submitted. There is no way to study <color=#FFFEC1>the Monolith</color> more than we already have. Perhaps it will remain a mystery to <color=#FFFEC1>RealWare</color> for decades to come. <color=#FFFEC1>Dr. Dennett</color>

Report date 991111. The device that was given to us allows us to gain a much deeper understanding of the nature of the Monolith. I'd like to know which corporation is so far advanced in quasimorphic research. RealWare has nothing like it. The data is already being brought together. <color=#FFFEC1>Dr. Dennett</color>

Report date 991113. My hypothesis was correct. <color=#FFFEC1>The Monolith</color> is a <color=#FFFEC1>quasimorph</color>. At least all the key metrics match the data that was provided to our team with the device. However, I have to decipher <color=#FFFEC1>what state</color> this quasimorph is in. What do these shifts to the left along the Q-spectrum mean? <color=#FFFEC1>Dr. Dennett</color>

Report date 991225. Usually at Christmas people give gifts, but they were taken away from us. Yesterday we handed over the device to security. Now all we have to do is process the data. Hypothesis four: can <color=#FFFEC1>quasimorphs</color> sleep. Hypothesis five: can quasimorphs <color=#FFFEC1>be dead</color> in a way that leave bodies. Perhaps the Monolith is a dead quasimorph. <color=#FFFEC1>Dr. Dennett</color>

To the hero of the Great Anarchist Revolution, Matt "Wildcutter", who fought in the battle for the Tifton space elevator and showed heroism that allowed it to be destroyed. His courage and devotion to the cause of freedom are forever inscribed in the history of humankind.
