Hexarch AnCom describes itself as a publishing business group. It is the largest producer of media content in the System. AnCom employs a huge staff of writers, screenwriters, film producers, video game developers, and so on. All this makes AnCom one of the most influential companies in the System. Through entertainment content, AnCom promotes the values ​​of anarcho-capitalism. It may not be the richest hexarch, but AnCom's commitment to the values ​​of the ancap system is beyond doubt.

It is well-known that AnCom has a considerable research division. It is unclear to many in the System what exactly these well-hidden research teams are doing. Due to our close work with AnCom in the past, we know that these studies focus on quasimorphosis.

No one can trace the history of AnCom exactly. It seems that the corporation simply appeared out of nowhere shortly before the Great Anarchist Revolution. However, there is information about the media conglomerate Eurasian Literary Society (ELS). It was this that became the basis of AnCom. ELS was the property of a major Eurasian businessman. According to rumors, a follower of ancient esoteric teachings. At some point, ELS shareholders removed the owner from managing the company, and it became rich from the production and sale of entertainment content. Then ELS began buying up the last independent studios and publishing houses, after which it transformed into AnCom. AnCom Corporation took an active part in the Revolution, sponsoring the formation of private armies and wiping away mercenaries' loyalty from national states by higher price.

Evil tongues call AnCom the Ministry of Propaganda of the ancap system. This is not far from the truth. All hexarchs can afford any field of activity. They are all engaged in production, and supplies, and energy production, and scientific activity. However, each hexarch invests most heavily in some unique profile, where it is simply impossible to compete with them. AnCom's focus is entertainment. However, their films, books, and video games are literally stuffed with anarcho-capitalist propaganda. There is range of action movies, where the hero shoots hordes of the Civil Resistance colnodes or historical strategy games about the days of the Great Anarchist Revolution. That's what AnCom creates for recreation.

Recently, the corporation has been creating content in which the protagonist destroys hordes of monsters and hosts of demons. Screen adaptations of Robert E. Howard's books about Conan the Barbarian, who saves humanity from monsters, are a popular endless series from AnCom. Also there is highly demanded a series of games about the conquistadors of Cortes, conquering the nightmarish and disgusting civilizations of Mesoamerica.

Leadership: Inner Rite consisting of nine members, Voice of the Rite Geoffroi Molay
Headquarters: HIS Unveiled (Venus)

System-scale publisher, research corporation.
Hello. Have you brought any books? I apologize... I didn't recognize your profession. We accept the following from you:

Tezctlan and his quasimorphs have learned how to remain in the physical world indefinitely. Tezctlan has proclaimed himself Emerald Emperor, and the Solar System as his future Emerald Empire. Tezctlan seeks to subjugate all of humanity, as well as other bramfaturas. At the end of 2199, he was able to access the SBN network and announce his intentions through open channels. The Hexarchy is doing its utmost to maintain the narrative that this was nothing more than an act of Civil Resistance. We know that Tezctlan's abilities and his sudden uprise are linked to Fresco corporation technology.

We have completed several missions for AnCom against Fresco earlier. It was our actions that led to the emergence or awakening (see below) of Tezctlan. However, we share this responsibility with Doctor Eipschwitz.

The history of Tezctlan is difficult to analyze precisely. This quasimorph either appeared or reborn on Venus in late 2199. As far as we can tell, the reborn option is closer to the truth. Tezctlan was the highest hierarch of Gannix, but then either disappeared from the bramfatura or was plunged into a sleep-like state. This happened hundreds to thousands of years ago. Fresco Corporation, a virtual monopoly on the surface of Venus, was attacked by other system corporations. Such a brazen raider takeover is possible only with the tacit approval of the Hexarchy. In a desperate attempt to save the corporation, its management allowed Dr. Eipschwitz, a radical scientist, to use any necessary means. The awakening of Tezctlan did not help Fresco survive, but those who tried to appropriate their property on Venus suffered serious losses.

Tezctlan declared his kingdom of Gannix an Empire. And he proclaimed that the new Emerald Empire is an empire of two realms. Now he wants only one thing: to subjugate humanity. Apparently, Tezctlan needs us not only as servants or slaves, but also as a constant source of gavvakh the source of energy.

Emerald Emperor Tezctlan, Imperial Court of Gannix
Headquarters: Feathered Temple (Venus)

Ancient king of Gannix, the bramfatura of Venus.
The Emerald Empire welcomes you. Here is the list of goods we accept:

Each bramfatura has its own complex hierarchy. Kings, dukes, barons, knights. The Feathered Masks are a new order of taltnoms*. They rebelled against Tezctlan and are slightly more sociable than other quasimorphs. There are reports that they are fighting for freedom against the tyranny of Tezctlan. There are analytical reports that Xiomara simply wants to return Gannix inside the borders of their bramfatura. In any case, their ultimate goal is the elimination of Tezctlan. To do this, they established themselves in physical reality, which automatically included them in the war of factions of the entire System.

About a thousand years ago, Tezctlan disappeared from Gannix, and it was Duchess Xiomara who took control of the Venusian bramfatura into her own hands.

*Taltnoms are quasimorphs of Gannix.

Duchess Xiomara, leader of the order
Headquarters: Louhi-City (Venus)

The order of the Taltnoms, which opposes the ruler of Gannix.
Are you one of the mistress's servants? Here are the resources needed by the Feathered Masks:

Hexarch SBN is a monopolist in the field of routing information flows in the Solar System. SBN means Solar Broadcast Network. At the lower level, SBN is divided into numerous news agencies. Each SBN station forms a separate agency, whose staff of journalists and editors immediately begins to produce news about the station, the celestial body, and all nearby routes. In addition, the SBN has technical units that support the network infrastructure. It is no secret that these units consist of highly qualified intelligence officers and decoding specialists. They intercept and analyze all traffic passing through the SBN stations.

In addition, it is necessary to note The System Portal SBN. A continuous flow of raw information that the SBN transmits from the AES (Earth). This is an open channel where all legal (not being the public enemy) participants of the ancap system get and place of types of messages. This is how an endless information and news feed is formed. Everyone simply calls this Portal the SBN. At the same time, cyphered data can be transmitted through it. How and what to fish out of the SBN is up to the recipient. Workers in the martian mines with outdated PCPUs can only count on an edited official news feed. Rich stations with serious analytical departments can intercept encrypted contracts for PMCs or mysterious relic transmissions on behalf of the long-destroyed Hive corporation. It became a sensation when, at the end of 2199, a strange message was transmitted through the SBN. The sender of this message was a quasimorph, who introduced himself to the entire System as Tezctlan.

All agencies, as well as technical departments, are closed on the Board of Directors of SBN. Strategic decisions are made at the board with the Chairman at the helm. The operational management of the corporation is carried out by the chief executive officer. The Board of Directors subjects of the latter's work to strict and constant audit. But it was not always so.

The history of SBN begins where the history of the major media conglomerates of the Earth ends. SBN emerged shortly before the Great Anarchist Revolution, when the heirs of the great visionary of the past, who already owned 75% of all media resources of humanity, bought up the remaining 25%. SBN took on the burden of coordinating the actions of the revolutionary armies, monitoring the actions of corporations during the GAR, and so on. It was SBN that provided the platform for posting the current version of the New Corporate Ethics, the de facto constitution of the ancap system.

For thirty long years, the executive director was Maria Ancel. She was an enthusiast of the news business and the philosophy of information. She reformed the management of SBN so that the board of directors were subordinate to the executive director. Mrs. Ancel and a small circle of her close associates had access to information, according to which they directed the activities of SBN. As a result, by the last third of the 22nd century, SBN became, in fact, the ministry of information of the Hexarchy. Of course, SBN rejects such an offensive label.

Nine years ago, Maria Ancel was killed in a terrorist attack on SBN. The Board immediately reversed her reforms to the CEO position, and Ancel's place was taken by the docile but highly effective Ally Pally. Nevertheless, the influence of Ancel's legacy is enormous. Monuments to her are erected at SBN stations, and the corporation's management holds peculiar rituals on the day of her death. The true heir to Ancel's ideas is considered to be the current chairman of the board Roberto Millner.

The policy of SBN consists of a declared strict subordination to the NCE. It is believed that SBN achieves its goals through cunning manipulation of PMCs and other hexarchs. Even SBN security service is extremely small. In his New Year's (2200) address to the ancap system, Millner called SBN "the herald of a new era of humanity, taking upon itself the heavy burden of bringing the light of truth."

Chairman of the Board : Roberto Millner, CEO: Ally Pally
Headquarters: AES (Earth)

Mediacorporation, It hosts the actual version of NCE.
Product information is more valuable than the product itself. Here is the information about what we need:

RealWare is the anarcho-capitalism bulldog. The corporation is responsible for the first salvo of the Great Anarchist Revolution. Although it was the failed policies of corrupt governments that led to the dissolution of UN-2, the one who struck the first blow, which caused the conflict to enter the hot phase, will always remain in memory. RealWare dropped thermonuclear charges on Geneva. The HIS Day of Fire, which carried out the attack, now is in orbital parking near Pluto: an eternal reminder of how the liberation of humanity began.

RealWare continues its policy of protecting the ancap system from any destabilization. The corporation does not engage in propaganda like AnCom and SBN, but in practice proves that the free market is the key to a fair society. The corporation also openly states that its own values are based on contempt for the purely reputational and investment sector of the market. RealWare states that it is ready to send employees to their deaths in the name of protecting the ability of others to do what they want, and thereby work for the benefit of humanity.

Of course, all these declarations do not prevent RealWare from investing in the most profitable sectors of the economy. However, RealWare's real strength is the production of spacecrafts, weapons, and defense systems.

RealWare has a strict discipline and a complex system of internal regulations. The corporation tries to imitate the image of the ancient Roman Empire, which is why it is often called the Empire. RealWare itself rejects any attempts to compare itself to a national state and considers it propaganda of the Civil Resistance. This is easy to believe, since the Empire's warehouses overflowing with weapons are the number one target for the rebels.

The corporation is managed by a Board of Trustees headed by a Precentor. For twenty years now, the position of Precentor has been held by Ian Fraser. A role model for everyone in the System, a man who has realized the Solar Dream. He started as a janitor at one of the RealWare stations, passed an internal interview for the position of security guard, and then moved up the ranks until he reached the very top. The head of all armed employees of the corporation is the Security Legatus. The position is currently held by Fraser's recently appointed bruiser Angus Dungeon. Rumor has it that the previous Security Legatus died on Venus while leading a force in one of deniable operations against another corporation. Since the Security Legatus has operational control over the real military force, RealWare has a well-known dual power: duumvirate.

All nuclear weapons of states were transferred by the Hexarchy to RealWare for safekeeping. It is believed that only they are capable of ensuring their safekeeping. The norms of the New Corporate Ethics enshrine this position, as well as the responsibility that RealWare bears for such trust from all participants of the ancap system.

RealWare begins its history in the chaos of the wars of the mid-21st century. The arms companies, supplying their products to all sides of the conflict at once, found it increasingly difficult to ensure extraterritoriality. So they hired several private armies to protect their property. From the very beginning of this cooperation, the army leadership pursued a policy of entryism in the management of corporations. As a result, one of the armies forced several corporations to unite under a new name. Of course, this led to several internal armed conflicts. Truly, the RealWare corporation was tempered in fire.

Precentor: Ian Fraser, Security Legatus: Angus Dungeon
Headquarters: HIS Ares (Mars)

Development and production of weapons. Training of security personnel.
Greetings, mercenary. We have toys here. You can leave the following items for us:

Daydream Chems is a corporation that stands at the top of the System's chemical industry, especially known for its achievements in the production of psychoactive substances. The company's products are popular in literally all strata of the ancap system: among those who want to relax, among scientists if they need to speed up their minds or suppress ethical regulators, and, of course, among the military. Chemical compounds developed in Daydream Chems laboratories are distinguished by the highest efficiency.

Of course, a significant number of medical products circulating in the System were introduced into the market by Daydream Chems.

It is interesting that not all market agents want to advertise supplies from the corporation. Products balancing on the edge medicines and psychoactive drugs are supplied by Daydream Chems, which ensures the anonymity of the buyer. It is very likely that a significant part of corporations that need to enhance the capabilities of their employees (from CoreWard MG to RealWare) are supplied by Daydream Chems.

The history of Daydream Chems begins as an anarcho-capitalist dream. A group of independent pharmacists decided to create unique substances to alter the perception of reality. After the Great Anarchist Revolution, they were no longer held back by regulatory laws and imaginary restrictions. Over time, their success led to integration with larger pharmaceutical concerns, where these chemists immediately took key positions.

CEO: Nathalie Lettmann
Headquarters: Avicenna Clinic (Fuller)

Chemical and pharmaceutical industries.
Welcome to our company's territory. Below is the list of accepted goods:

PlanetBridge is a leading corporation in the field of engineering and construction technologies. Not every artificial celestial body in the Solar System and not every station were built by PlanetBridge. But the corporation has worked as a contractor in almost all of them. Moreover, PlanetBridge does not have a narrow specialization: it does not matter whether we are talking about providing a station with internal infrastructure or developing a transport network on a planet or satellite surface. PlanetBridge's motto: "Building bridges between planets".

PlanetBridge's efficiency and engineering are so deeply embedded in the System's transportation networks that every third orbital station is rumored to bear traces of their interference and hidden control. Of course, working in outer space is associated with risks to the lives of workers. The corporation entices employees with promises of huge financial rewards for those willing to participate in building the future.

PlanetBridge also prides itself on its educational programs. The corporation provides general and advanced training in engineering and project management. These programs are in demand both among corporate players seeking to optimize their production, and among parents who have taken the risk of having children and want them to have a comfortable future as members of the elite caste of builders of the new world.

The history of PlanetBridge dates back to the early days of space exploration. Their first projects included developing life support systems for space stations and building the first large space colonies. The young corporation gained widespread attention when it purchased the International Space Station from governments.

CEO: Ushijima Moromao
Headquarters: Arcadis (Earth)

Corporation of engineering and construction technologies.
Welcome to our company's territory. Below is the list of accepted goods:

Grasshopper Technologies is a transport giant, the absolute leader in cargo delivery to the Outer System. The corporation specializes in fast and reliable delivery to the outermost frontiers of the developed space. It also ensures the safety of transportation, assuring that all logistics specialists are also trained in highly effective defense. The routes used by Grasshopper Technologies have more than enough threats, including Unchained Belt and its pirate crews.

The corporation prides itself on its logistics squads, which are ready to repel anyone who encroaches on the convoy. The high demand for cargo protection has spawned a whole division within the corporation dedicated to hiring and training space cowboys who are more interested in space battles than in stable work. Rumor has it that such squads are often used by the corporation far beyond the transportation industry. According to other information, its defense units compete with full-fledged military contractors.

The corporation's motto is "Cargo is not only delivered, it is delivered safely." Grasshopper Technologies provides its services to both small companies and large market players who do not want to risk their transport assets.

The history of Grasshopper Technologies began as a corporation that delivered cargo across Earth using suborbital jumps. Such rockets were called "grasshoppers", hence the name of the corporation. Soon after the Great Anarchist Revolution, the corporation saw prospects in the development and transportation of cargo to the Outer System, gradually building a complex logistical infrastructure of intermediate stations, and then beginning to train security squads.

CEO: Hodaya Lehmann
Headquarters: Angel Terminal (Ceres)

Transportation corporation, especially for a heavy cargo.
Welcome to our company's territory. Below is the list of accepted goods:

Sunlight Coven is one of the most unusual and mysterious corporations in the System. On the one hand, it is an ordinary religious organization. Religions were forced to institutionalize as corporations under the ancap system. On the other hand, the Coven competes with Daydream Chems in pharmaceutical research. They also compete with AnCom because they own a small media empire. Based on the traditions of 20th and 21st century cults, reinforced by modern psychoactive technologies, the Coven offers its followers not just a religious experience, but “true enlightenment.” All employees of the corporation are required to participate in religious and ecstatic practices, since it is believed that enlightened people are much more effective than ordinary people.

The pharmaceutical arm of the Coven is a vital element in ensuring the commercial stability of the religious corporation. Sunlight Coven sells highly effective medical technologies, but does not openly trade in psychoactive substances. Although their drugs for the treatment of various types of addictions and support of rehabilitation are in great demand.

The Coven is also active in the media business. The corporation owns several film studios that produce documentaries about ancient and modern religious practices. The main consumers of this content are the employees of the Coven itself. However, multi-part videos about ancient Egyptian rituals, orders of stonemasons, or purple caps find their viewers everywhere. This is a popular form of escapism for low-ranking corporate workers.

Sunlight Coven's educational programs are recognized as some of the best in the System in the fields of sociology and religious studies. The Coven provides educational services to those who wish to study the social structures and mechanisms that underlie modern cults and beliefs. Of course, only one of them can rid one of prejudices - the cult of the Coven itself.

Sunlight Coven historically emerged in the mid-20th century. As a corporation, it was formalized shortly after the Great Anarchist Revolution. A group of mystics and scientists took responsibility for the organization. Soon, the Coven began to seek ways to synthesize old occult knowledge with advanced pharmaceutical and neuroscience technologies. The fall of states allowed the corporation to expand its influence, offering unique spiritual practices that go beyond traditional ideas about religious experience.

Archpriest: Eric MacLathagain. Archpriestess: Edita Domina
Headquarters: Dark Flora (Deimos)

Religious corporation and publisher.
Welcome to our company's territory. Below is the list of accepted goods:

Franche-Comte PS is a corporation specializing in the development and operation of high-end security systems. PS stands for "prison solutions." Their technology is used not only to protect facilities, but also to contain the most dangerous public enemies of the System. Franche-Comte PS provides a full range of services - from the design of security systems to the management of prisons, where each prisoner is under constant and strict control. Their prisons are known as some of the most secure and impregnable, with unique technologies that ensure that prisoners cannot escape even with a help from the outside.

Despite the fact that the corporation turns any station into a prison and immediately begins to extract profit from it, they, like everyone else, do not limit themselves only to their main focus. The corporation also employs an elite staff of couriers who specialize in the safe delivery of valuable cargo and sensitive data to the most inaccessible or dangerous places. These couriers are known for their ability to avoid any obstacles, be its competitors, pirate crews, or adverse space conditions. The corporation's slogan describes both types of core services: "Safety guaranteed". Rumor has it that Grasshopper Technologies hates Franche-Comte PS for competing in the field of cargo delivery.

The history of Franche-Comte PS dates back to the Great Anarchist Revolution, when the disappearance of states required new forms of punishment and security. Starting out as a provider of security systems for private prisons, the company quickly became a leading provider of complete prison solutions for a variety of corporate clients. NCE is vague about the status of a prisoner within the ancap system, but Franche-Comte PS will accept a contract for any cargo security. The contract states that the responsibility for what that cargo is lies with the party providing it.
Welcome to our company's territory. Below is the list of accepted goods:

The Church of Revelation is the largest religious organization in the Solar System. It provides high-quality religious services on a commercial basis. Their main goal is to satisfy the spiritual needs of any individual who seeks revelation and meaning in a world devoid of the foundation of such false concepts as patriotism. The Church of Revelation is aimed at the widest possible audience: from believers seeking salvation to those interested only in the therapeutic aspects of spiritual practice.

The organization sells a variety of religious goods, from ritual objects and amulets to high-tech interfaces for creating personalized religious experiences. They also have a strong presence in the media space, producing educational programs and spiritual excursions where anyone can take the path to revelation according to their tastes - from a gentle existential search to intense mystical practices. For a very high price, the Church of Revelation can organize a pilgrimage to Earth to the preserved holy sites.

The Church has a policy of openness and inclusivity, allowing each person to choose how they wish to engage with their faith. Services are provided in the form of individual rituals as well as mass gatherings held at Church-owned assets throughout the System.

The history of the Church of Revelation originates from several ecumenical movements that sought to unite various religious movements in the mid-21st century. In the chaos of wars, these movements contributed to the centralization of different branches of one ancient religion around a small theocracy in Europe. After the Great Anarchist Revolution, ecumenical movements were forced to adapt to new conditions. This is how the Church of Revelation appeared. It was the first to be formalized as a corporation, taking a dominant position, offering a universal set of rituals and concepts that corresponded to any spiritual needs.
Welcome to our company's territory. Below is the list of accepted goods:

CoreWard MG (Mining Group) is a mining corporation specializing in the development of asteroids and planetary mining systems. The main activity is the extraction of minerals from the depths of celestial bodies, including ore, rare earth elements, and ice deposits from asteroids of the outer System. CoreWard MG controls a vast network of mines, tunnels and processing complexes, turning harsh asteroids and planetary masses into resource sources for the entire ancap system.

Abandoned mines, deep tunnels, and depleted asteroids are all that CoreWard MG leaves behind. In the face of fierce competition and the constant threat of pirate attacks, the corporation continues to delve into the most remote corners of the Solar System. The hard work of mining is accompanied by complex operations to ensure safety and maintain working conditions in harsh environments where even air costs a fortune.

CoreWard MG is also actively developing its educational programs, offering training in the fields of geology and mining. These programs are designed to prepare highly qualified specialists who are able to work effectively in deep space conditions. The corporation's students are trained in the latest methods of analysis and processing of materials necessary for successful extraction in extreme conditions of space objects.

The history of CoreWard MG begins with the first expeditions to Mars, when resource extraction outside Earth became both economically feasible and necessary. Since then, the corporation has built a powerful infrastructure capable of operating on the most inhospitable objects in the Solar System. After the Great Anarchist Revolution CoreWard MG became the main one in the production pyramid of the ancap system, providing all other market agents with raw materials. Due to the particularly brutal working conditions for low-ranking workers, escapees from the CoreWard MG mines are more likely than others to join the ranks of the Civil Resistance.
Welcome to our company's territory. Below is the list of accepted goods:

The Civil Resistance (CR) is a terrorist organization waging a long-term struggle against the anarcho-capitalist order, against the ancap system. Their goal is to restore states, which, in their opinion, are capable of returning control and order, "which they prefer to the unbridled chaos of anarcho-capitalism". Despite the dubious goal of restoring the old state system and comprehensive control over personal freedom, they continue to recruit supporters among low-ranking workers who have lost faith in equal opportunities.

The CR's operations are always carefully planned and covert. Even if they resort to direct actions, it always comes as a surprise.

The CR soldiers, known as colnodes, are humans altered by advanced psychotechniques, pharmaceuticals, and biotechnology, allowing them to act with unprecedented cruelty and endurance. The main hypothesis regarding the nature of the colnodes is that they do not have the so-called phenomenal consciousness, which in normal people wastes too much energy and inhibits natural reflexes. Colnodes are known for their astounding combat effectiveness and ruthlessness. There is a theory that they do not feel pain, fear, or other human emotions, recognizing these states only as indicators: damage, danger, and so on. It is believed that these changes allow them to fight to the last, without fear of death. It is possible that this is not due to psychotechnics and medicine. Some sociologists believe that the CR uses enough propaganda to manipulate mind and deprive people of basic human qualities in the name of the fanatical goal.

The organization's roots are in the remnants of the old state armies that were defeated in the fight against corporations during the Great Anarchist Revolution. On their basis, underground groups were allegedly created, which laid the foundation for the CR. However, how and why these groups turned into an army of colnodes, where they got the corresponding technologies from is unknown. Although the CR fights to restore what they call "order and justice", in reality they seek to return humanity to the control of state institutions, which, as everyone knows, is just a form of slavery. Their actions cause significant damage to corporations, making the Civil Resistance a significant threat to the ancap system.

Leadership: General Secretary Leah, separate cells (colcones)
Headquarters: [?]

A terrorist organization fighting to restore the nation-states.
Comrade! It's finally time for expropriation. Here's what we need in this area of the struggle:

Dilthey is an engineering hypercorporation. The Keeper of the Belt, as it is sometimes called by its envious admirers or embittered competitors, which, in the ancap system, is often the same thing. With its incredible successes, Dilthey reminds us that success comes to those who are able to combine fundamental science and engineering excellence, new social conditions and an irrepressible desire to improve human life.

The Dilthey Corporation can best be described through its history. Having grown out of the ruins of the old order in the midst of the Great Anarchist Revolution, the corporation does not directly come from any major conglomerate. At the beginning of its journey, several medical corporations teamed up with an ambitious engineering concern to jointly research human adaptation to life in space. The medical part of the corporation focused on psychology and psychiatry, conducting numerous studies on how the human psyche reacts to the new extreme conditions of the space environment. The results of this research allowed the Dilthey engineering branch to develop space stations and residential complexes taking into account the psychological and physiological needs of humans.

During the fierce conflicts on Earth and Mars, Dilthey did not engage in direct combat, focusing instead on reclaiming the Main Belt and some of the Outer System's moons. Despite this, Dilthey's propaganda claims that they played a decisive role in securing the GAR's victory in these regions, defending them from loyalist and civilian armies. These conflicts were less destructive than the battles on the inner planets, but allowed Dilthey to consolidate their position and pave the way for future dominance in space engineering.

Today, Dilthey is one of the leading players in the construction and exploration of space. The corporation implements projects to create artificial planets, build cities inside asteroids, and change the orbits of small celestial bodies. In addition, the corporation offers educational programs in space engineering, applied psychology, space sociology, and even new philosophy. These programs are especially popular among those who want not only to work in space, but also to take part in its transformation for the benefit of corporations.
Your products must meet our requirements. Here's what we need:

The Unchained Belt (UB) is not just a collective name for a group of public enemies. For many in the Solar System, it is a symbol of true freedom in space. Their spacecrafts suddenly appear in the path of large corporate convoys, only to take loot and disappear before anyone knows what happened. The UB controls a variety of pirate organizations, from individual crews to the entire pirate city of Hargeysa on the asteroid Interamnia. The UB supplies the pirates with resources and information, in exchange for a share of the spoils. Although there is an opinion from several corporate intelligence agencies that the UB cannot be separated from the pirates: they are pirates. Any bandit group that decides to act independently immediately faces the wrath of the loyal UB crews.

Despite their criminal methods and extremely short lifespans, space pirates inspire outcasts across the Solar System. They have a philosophy: freedom for freedom's sake. If the Unchained Belt has an ideology, it is born out of dissatisfaction with the false freedom of the ancap system. For them, the Main Belt is a place that could be a space for free living, but instead has been turned into a resource base for the corporate machine. Unlike the Civil Resistance, the UB does not seek to restore the old world and laws. They live by their own rules: the Pirate Code.

Each new raid is not just an attack for resources. It is an act of defiance, a rebellion against the ancap system that wants to drive everyone into corporate cages. Each new raid adds another legend to their glory, and rumors of the greatest adventures in history fuel the flames of interest and bring in new people. The UB agents have infiltrated everywhere - from PMCs to the corporations themselves - and no one can be sure whether their colleague is working for the pirates. In a world where power belongs to those with more money and spacecrafts, the Unchained Belt chooses to live by different rules: they create their own destiny in the Solar System.

Leadership: Council of Commanders and Captains
Headquarters: Hargeysa (Interamnia)

Union of pirate crews.
Every deal is a step towards freedom. Here's what we need:

Shedu's Thousand is an army formed by former soldiers of the RealWare corporation. They betrayed their duty to the corporation for the sake of the eternal path of war. RealWare has always had a unique corporate culture. Although its goal, like any other corporation, was profit, for the security service combatants, honor, military valor and dignity were above all else. It's not just a market reputation, but an internal obsession to serve through endless training, brutal trials, and war for the sake of war itself. RealWare security specialists were trained to fight in any conditions and even infiltrated various PMCs under the guise of clones for the sake of extreme combat practice.

But even such fanatical discipline could not resist the call of destruction. Temptation came when RealWare troops guarded the ancient ruins of Sinkhole Oasis, the resting place of the ruler of the martian bramfatura Urparp, a legendary quasimorph and leader of the golden legions. Fighting the visions sent by his ancient empire, the soldiers succumbed to the promise of their new master: to give them a war they would find nowhere else. Urparp did not promise wealth or political power. He offered eternal war, a fight for the sake of fighting, a battle not subservient to mercenary goals, but only to the flames of destruction. Thus was born the army of the Shedu's Thousand.

A disciplined, well-equipped military force that uses a combination of corporate military technology and what Ur bramfatura gives them. The fighters of the Shedu's Thousand are enhanced by both technology and gavvakh. Each victory feeds their hunger for the next battle. Each battle is a step towards eternal conflict.

Unlike Tezctlan, Urparp does not wish to build a new Empire in the Solar System. He believes that the Shedu's Thousand must prepare for the awakening of Gagtungr, the Master of the Sun.

Leadership: Sovereign Guardian of Ur Urparp, Thousand's General Staff
Headquarters: Sinkhole Oasis (Mars)

Army of ur, the bramfatura of Mars.
Greetings, warrior. Here is a list of what will strengthen our army:

Secret laboratory of the Fresco corporation, where research on quasimorphosis was conducted. Dr. Eipschwitz assembled the Telephaturic Dislocator here, a device that allows access to planetary bramfatures. Now, Flat Obsidian can be used as a convenient transit base on the surface of Mercury if you are not afraid of the phased temple located beneath it.

After Earth was transformed into an ecological paradise, almost all production was moved into orbit. Over time, the practice of building orbital factories proved to be highly profitable. Rachmaninov-Energia is one of many orbital factories. Its uniqueness lies in its utilization of solar energy. Enormous solar panels and a system of mirrors give the factory the appearance of a surrealistic tree. Whoever controls this factory holds a significant share of production in the inner System.

Discovery RG is a research center. It conducts studies of the photosphere and surface changes on Mercury. One of the laboratories in the center is equipped for studying specific phenomena found in the Solar System.

The terraforming of Mercury is still ongoing. Experts say that it will never be possible to create completely hospitable conditions here. Therefore, many colonies operate in automatic mode. Of course, it is very convenient for extraction stations. Although there are often residential zones here, in case personnel are needed for repairs or direct actions to protect private property.

Orbital stations sometimes have the most unimaginable purposes. Goethe-1 is a military academy and testing ground. Here, you can purchase training courses in tactics, strategy, and field support of combat operations. The personnel take pride in the fact that many corporate security service leaders have undergone training here.

The streams of information circulating in the Solar System are exabytes of storms passing by the planets. Network centers are located everywhere to process and route data. Boethius is one such center. The station facilitates data exchange in the central part of the inner System.

Mammoth Terminal is a spaceport for cargo shuttles and interplanetary spacecrafts. Mammoth is a typical spaceport for the inner System. It provides charging, refueling, and regular maintenance services. Due to Mercury's mass, even heavy interplanetary spacecrafts can land here.

Prisons are a delicate service. Penitentiary decisions are provided in various places in the Solar System. l-BSA is one of the most well-known prisons due to its size and quality of service. Recently, information has leaked to the SBN about special containment conditions related to quasimorphosis.

Orbital factories are the main source of goods in the Solar System. Jinxing-Gongchang II is an old but reliable factory. In addition to standard sources of energy, it uses heat from the dense upper layers of Venus' atmosphere.

AnCom is a Hexarch corporation. Once it specialized solely in media products, but recently, there has been information about its increased research focus. After receiving a transmission to the SBN made on behalf of Tetzclan, the HIS Unveiled of AnCom was sent to Venus and took a high orbit around the planet.
Platforms camouflaged as extraction stations. Underneath them lies the Fresco research laboratory. It is there that we found information about Dr. Eipshwitz's head being held in the l-BSA prison.
A city located under a geodesic dome, consisting of only five-star hotels. That's how Louhi-City used to look. Now the colony resembles more of a zone of continuous combat actions.

Fortuna University is an engineering and physics university. Cutting-edge research is conducted here, but the main source of income is the sale of training courses. Graduates of Fortuna are almost guaranteed to secure employment and can choose the corporation they prefer.

Most colonies on Venus are located under geodesic domes. This is partly necessary to cool and discharge the atmosphere, and partly to contain highly invasive GMO flora and fauna. Oddibord-3 is a Fresco geodesic heavily affected by unknown events. There is information in the SBN that something terrible is happening on the underground levels of the colony.
Clotho-Node is a transit base under a geodesic dome that former owner Fresco used to access hard-to-reach places in the jungles. For unknown reasons, it is now in complete ruins.

The Feathered Temple is a cluster of phased structures amidst the jungles. It seems that a significant portion of Venus's bramfatura has shifted here. The place received its name due to the prevailing bird theme in the design of quasimorphic structures.

Market agents encrypt everything they send to the common network. However, everyone knows that one of the advantages of owning routing stations is intercepting data for subsequent decryption and resale attempts. Heritage Station is the largest routing node in the inner System. Almost the entire colossal volume of information passing through space from Mercury to the Asteroid Belt is filtered and redirected through Heritage.
Arcadis Transit Terminal is an orbital port for refueling, charging, and servicing interplanetary spacecrafts. It is a highly profitable enterprise known as the "Earth's main port" in the System.

Pine Gap Training Center is the oldest sociological laboratory in the Solar System. It also houses a large educational center where you can purchase educational services for manager and psychologist training.

Skylab is a costly system of engineering test site. Almost a quarter of patents in the inner System are associated with inventions made here. Owning Skylab promises enormous daily profits to its owners.

Due to the interdiction regime, visiting Earth is not accessible to everyone in the Solar System. To avoid causing difficulties for its numerous clients, the SBN corporation established its headquarters in orbit. It is said that the ISS Station AES is based on an ancient orbital station dating back to the state period. Besides serving as SBN's headquarters, the station is an information routing node, ensuring a monopoly on information passage in the inner System.

On Earth, there is almost no production. At least that's what is reported in materials distributed through the SBN. Factories have been moved into orbit to preserve the fragile ecology of humanity's cradle. Akatsuki Kojo is a very old-fashioned orbital factory that operates on atomic energy.
Paragon FC is an ancient factory that still runs on atomic energy. Such factories are now scarce in the System. Nevertheless, this industrial workhorse provides its owner with sufficient profits.

Residential and working areas are a highly profitable business in the Solar System. Once you build, buy, or otherwise acquire such a location, you start receiving an inexhaustible stream of rental dividends. The orbital city Phenomenon fully lives up to its name. Berths of docking docks protruding in all directions from bulky modules make it resemble a ball of spaghetti hanging in space.
MTZ is a real city in a stationary lunar orbit. The convenience and comfort of the modules make their rental highly attractive, resulting in extremely high income for their owner.

The main fuel in the Solar System is quantum liquid H-3. Qi Helium-3 is the largest station for processing Helium-3 into quantum liquid. Within the inner System, this plant is the only stable source of this fuel.

The Moon is a convenient launching pad for flights into the outer System. The AnCap Dogma Harbor is a large refueling and repair orbital port. Stopping here can help avoid the need to linger in orbit around Mars on the way to the Asteroid Belt and beyond.

Moon TC is the tallest skyscraper in New Seattle. It is a residential and working complex. Renting here can bring incredible profits to the owner. This is why owning MTC is the subject of a real trade war. And often not just a trade war.

The second-largest building on the Moon. Candle Arcology is a glossy black building resembling a candle. When the Sun rises above New Seattle, bright sparks of gleams play on its surface. The building is intended to symbolize the wealth and professionalism of the RealWare corporation.

The third-largest building on the Moon. Alliance Arcology is a city within a city. It has business levels, residential levels, and even production levels. The daily income from owning the arcology is difficult to estimate.

Tycho Terminal is the main spaceport on the surface of the Moon. Interplanetary spacecrafts rarely land here since AnCap Dogma Harbor is quite nearby. However, it serves as a constant landing and takeoff point for transport shuttles.

Shu Center is an information routing node. Thousands of petabytes of information pass through this information complex every hour. Almost everything coming from the outer System to the inner one goes through Shu Center.

There are not many orbital factories operating on atomic energy beyond Earth's orbit. Red Tiangong is one of them. Due to its proximity to the outer System, owning this property comes with risks. It's unknown which workers sympathize with Civil Resistance and are capable of sabotage. However, the property owner has the right to protect it by any means.

Rebus Sky City consists of several modules - residential, educational, and business sections. Due to its location on the border of the inner System, many tenants are tied to this orbital station. This means that the source of rental income will be almost guaranteed for the owner.

RealWare is a Hexarchy corporation. The Hexarchy is an informal alliance of six major corporations that contributed to the Great Anarchic Revolution. RealWare is one of the wealthiest Hexarchs. This conglomerate deals with virtually everything, but its main source of income is weapons and industrial systems. HIS Ares is stationed near Mars, ready to deploy anywhere in the Solar System to protect the corporation's interests.

Argyre-14 Mining Station is a colony with extremely challenging working conditions. That's how honest competitive struggle goes. If you're not ready to invent or organize, if you lack the sacred flame of Atlantis - you will sell your labor. And that's okay. Become a worker and take a worthy place in a free anarchic society. The station is located right in the middle of the desert. Life here resembles life in boomtowns during the colonization of North America's Wild West.

Karst Oasis is a geological research station on the edge of a Karst crater. Mars's geology research has long disappointed many. The laboratory continues its work "out of habit." However, corporations usually don't tolerate idle expenses. And perhaps there is still something to study here.

Gloria Terminal is a spaceport that provides launch, landing, refueling, charging, and current maintenance of shuttles and interplanetary spacecrafts. The terminal is located on the outskirts of Intercity, the only city on Mars that was conceived as a symbol of humanity's prosperity but ended up half-abandoned, swept by dusty winds, and the graveyard of many hopes.

Amidst the desert streets of Intercity, covered in a thick layer of reddish dust, stands one truly vibrant building - Intercity Trade Center Arcology. Despite the skepticism towards Mars, one can make substantial profits here from those seeking fortune on the red planet.

Charon DocBay is a refueling and repair spaceport on the orbit of Phobos. A place where a pub occupies about half of the useful area of a residential module. Tired and experienced workers from the outer System spend their time here.

Canaan Terminal is a station for servicing, charging and repairing ground equipment. From here it is extremely convenient to get to remote inaccessible places of Phobos. Apart from these obvious features, the base is extremely convenient if you need a secluded place away from the main routes but still functional and with trained staff.

At the very beginning of the space age, people had high hopes for the colonization of Mars. The possibilities of the red planet seemed limitless. All these dreams were destined to be dispelled by dusty winds. Since that time, many small colonies remained, which were to become new business and intellectual centers. This also applies to the moons of Mars. The Hypnos-2 colony is a profitable but still extremely provincial asset.

Orphan Mining Base is a mining facility on Phobos. Eternal twilight, a suspension of dust, hard work in spacesuits - all that awaits workers here. For some, this is a way to start a working career if they fail to pay for education, and for some, it is a platform for campaigning against the New Corporate Ethic.

On Mars, Phobos and Deimos, colonies often combine opposite functions. Rogue City is both a charging and repair terminal for ground vehicles and at the same time serves as a corporate colony that brings constant dividends for rent to its owner.

Swift and Voltaire is an unexpectedly large, by Martian standards, engineering and sociological laboratory, as well as an educational center. It is located neatly between the Swift and Voltaire craters.

The High Ares Post was founded by the military of one of the old states as a radar station. After the Great Anarchist Revolution, it was taken over by a corporation. The post, which has grown noticeably since then, has been constantly changing hands.

Warden-D is more of a warehouse system and staging post than a full-fledged colony. Life on Deimos is simple, even ascetic. Most often, the staff of such places consists of some hermits and religious fanatics.

Hidden away from prying eyes are the sociological laboratory and a small educational center. Dark Flora trains spies and corporate agents who need special moral lability. It is said that negotiators coming out of here have two minds, one of which has suppressed sincerity. It is this consciousness that seizes control at the critical moment.
Maybe someday the Sundog Zone will become a full-fledged colony on Deimos. So far, this asset can only be useful as a semi-secret transshipment base.
A multi-level hydroponic factory for producing natural food. An important source of calories for the Internal System and a valuable asset.

A space where you can rent a warehouse for storing anything. There are warehouses shielded from radiation or any type of waves. The asset owner receives not only a good fee for renting warehouses but also everything stored in case of overdue rent.
A small business center and control center for Fuller's position in orbit and the satellite's main systems. Owners of all other stations on Fuller are required to pay contributions to the Core owner.

An educational institution for wealthy families. Here you cannot get engineering or working education; they will not teach management theory here. All the Academy can provide is a classical education for the class of ancap-aristocrats.
A multidisciplinary medical center. In addition, there is a research unit here.
A refueling station for cubecentric engine spacecrafts that have business near the Sun.

A colony located in one of the spacecrafts that form Volcano. A pile of dark slums in the womb of a partially-disassembled HIS. People from here will take any job, so corporations on Mercury have no shortage of cheap labor resources.

A research laboratory that carefully isolated from Kizzuwatna. Here, the photosphere of the Sun, the phenomenon of magnetism and other fundamental physical phenomena are studied at the forefront of science.

A physical research center for studying different types of radiation. It is also home to a small engineering division that develops personal weapons based on radiation and atomic energy. The corporations that own the center are not trying to make a direct profit from it, but as much as possible for the production of such rare weapons.

An advanced power plant that extracts energy directly from photons. The Tesla-Musk System installed on it is the intellectual property of the Dilthey Corporation, whose secret is carefully preserved. No one has yet been able to open the system for study. Dilthey installed a multi-factor defense system with explosives there.
A hydroponic farm that uses solar energy and radiation to produce advanced GMO plants. If you eat something vegan anywhere in the System, then the raw materials most likely came from Photosphere-17.

An entertainment center providing a unique service. In a radiation-shielded shuttle, you will fly so close to the Sun that its magnetic fields would directly affect your brain. The result is strictly individual. Some people experience an encounter with God, some experience their own birth, some get rid of childhood traumas. Literally anything can happen with your consciousness. The center does not provide security guarantees. For treatment of microtumors, it is recommended to contact a medical facility within a month after the travel.
This is the laboratory for the research of ultrahigh temperatures. An extremely profitable asset and one of the richest sources of industrial innovation in the System.

This is school of intelligence field mastery. Tutors don’t care who owns the asset, as long as they provide them a good life rate. Here, enormous resources are used to teach espionage, information extraction, and interrogation.

This is the prison that built in the depths of the Mechta. Do you know that Mechta is word for Dream in Russian? This is literally prison that built-in inside the dream. Anyway, the prison is very conservative, without any frills. There are cages, long corridors, tired and angry guards.
This is the large brothel that can satisfy the most demanding tastes.
This is the training ground inside the Mechta, which you can rent and fulfill there any fantasies associated with the use of almost any type of weapon.

This is a business center where branches of many corporations operate. True, managers are sent here as if into exile. And although many eventually find ways to have fun on the Mechta, such a business trip does not bode well for their career.
E is a laboratory for the production of recreational and relaxation drugs. Here you will find a tablet or injection for every taste and color.

This is a space port on the surface of the Mechta. Since the Mechta is located in a very high Venusian orbit, this terminal is a convenient stopover point for those moving towards or away from the Sun without stopping on Venus.
"Business center above Venus" as told commercial. There are greenhouses, rich restaurants, observation decks. The life of the upper class was in full swing here until the Tezctlan invasion began.

This is a flexible space organized to accommodate security personnel. There are gyms, lecture rooms, and a living area. Corporation that owns the Blade always has at his disposal a reserve of fresh and motivated security specialists. Training ground got its name in honor of the Eclipse Blades PMC. They defended asteroid from contractors of an unknown corporation that wanted to stop the HAVOC project.
This is the specialized plant for the production of robots and equipment for them.
This is a residential colony on HAVOC. It is the main source of labor in the Venusian habitable cluster.
This is hydroponic farm for growing natural food crops. There are hectares of earth-type arable land covered by a geodesic dome.

This is the astronomical research center on the external side of Tsiolkovsky. Powerful telescopes and radar dishes are aimed at deep space here. There are rumors that, under the guise of a research center, the owners of the asset always organize an intelligence base here.

A colossal automatic factory for the production of synthetic food proteins and the cultivation of plant food. Everything that grows here, from cockroaches to artificial cow livers, is used as food for the inhabitants of the System. Without Chick-Chick/Moo-Moo, extraterrestrial colonies would starve to death.

This is the business center housing, corporate offices that provide communication with the Earth. One might say that these are corporate embassies, but the Hexarchy has declared such language offensive due to the comparison of corporations with the old-fashioned states.

CoDT or Center of Defense Technologies is a large specialized factory, a rarity in the System. Typically, factories can be easily reconfigured to produce any product. However, the CoDT works with one goal. This goal is to produce as many weapons as possible. For defensive purposes, of course.
This is the Zero Gravity Training Center. Experienced teaching staff will train your personnel for extravehicular work for a reasonable fee.

The newest colony on the surface of Ceres. A small city equipped with the state-of-the-art engineering facilities from the Dilthey Corporation. The facilities allow for dignitas to be earned from the colony's inhabitants, making the station a tasty morsel for the Main Belt.
Ceres' main refueling terminal. Fuel for cubecentric engines this far from the Sun costs a huge amount of dignitas. Any transportation conglomerate would like to acquire the Angel terminal.

The first settlement and base for all miners of Ceres. Here you can get information about the ore-bearing areas of the asteroid, negotiate the exchange of mined material, hire workers, connect to the markets of the Main Belt and the Inner System.
A mining factory located at the bottom of a deep ravine, in the shadow of one of Ceres's mountains. It has a bad reputation due to the extremely high mortality rate among miners.
Former Civil Resistance base. After the Oracle was cleared of colnodes by the joint efforts of security services of several corporations, the station changed hands and, in fact, belongs to no one.

A mining factory whose tunnels cut through a small mountain range that runs along Ceres' equator. It's hard to find a place in the Solar System more boring than Flinthold. That's unless corporations take direct action here, of course.

A station attached to the back of a large mirror. The station directly controls the rotation of the mirror, and houses residential and industrial sectors. The mirror itself is used to collect sunlight and illuminate assets on Ceres whose owners are willing to pay for it.

A small orbital station. Serves as a passenger port for those departing from Ceres and arriving here. Luxurious casinos for those waiting for interplanetary spacecrafts are adjacent to dens and hiding places of terrorists, pirates and smugglers, hidden in service tunnels.

A Flying Palace built by the Dilthey Corporation as a fashionable vacation spot for the System's wealthy. However, the Main Belt never became popular with the corporate bigwigs, so Pedigree Station became a mid-level residential station near Ceres.
Coordination, dispatch and radar center. Whoever owns the Frostreach Command owns information about the movement in the Main Belt.

Port of Wernher and one of the main ports of the Main Belt. Jaffa receives and sends hundreds of spacecrafts daily. The station compartments are filled with corporate offices, and the area along the service channels is densely built up with capsule hotels.

Cryptoria is a masterpiece of scientific thought by Dilthey and their contractor, who wished to remain anonymous. It is a unique data center, operating thanks to a complex cooling system based on a closed cycle of liquids and gases. There are never any overheating events that lead to temporary cessation of computer operation. Except in cases of fierce firefights and the use of flamethrowers.

The central mining station of Vesta. The first settlers landed at a hill called Mount Carmel. For many years there was an independent religious community here, but during the <color=#FFFEC1>Great Anarchist Revolution</color> (<color=#FFFEC1>VAR</color>) a settlement was found, and all the inhabitants of the community were hired by the CoreWard MG corporation.
An underground colony and permanent base for temporary mining operations throughout Vesta. Lavinium has come under the control of the Civil Resistance several times in the past.

A hill completely excavated by several mining corporations, in the place of which a colossal geodesic was erected. When it reflects the light of the Sun, it resembles an eye on the gray and dull "face" of Vesta. Under the dome is a mining colony and a crater that is digging in ever deeper into the surface of Vesta.

The CoreWard MG heavy interplanetary vessel serves as the corporation's base of operations in the Main Belt and oversees assets on Vesta to ensure rapid intervention and either defense or appropriation.

A colony on the surface of Pallas, founded by the now-defunct Hive Corporation. It is an old town by Main Belt standards, having seen its heyday and decline. The resources of Pallas around the colony were depleted, and it was converted into a local transportation hub.
A fueling station and landing terminal for HIS. If you want to fly past the major ports of the Main Belt on your way to the Outer or Inner System, you'll definitely make a stop here.

Once the headquarters of the Hive Corporation, which ceased to exist in the mid-22nd century, the asset is now an auxiliary headquarters and a place for management meetings. It is usually rented out for the same purposes.
Once a small mining base that collected frozen methane from beneath the surface, it became a major base when large deposits of platinum were discovered there.

A city whose relative top is always directed towards the Sun. The peculiarities of Geist's orbit and its control, carried out from Vasa, always maintain this position. Special light concentrators, made according to Dilthey's strictly classified technology, allow the city to be illuminated so that it is even possible to maintain a real park in it.

The city is located entirely inside Geist, on the inner surface of a huge artificial cave. Malmö is illuminated by a fiber optic thread that wraps around the ceiling and emits a powerful light. The station does not have its own port, so the only way to get to and from Malmö is through transport tunnels that connect the city with two others: Vasa and Schwerin.

A spaceport, combined with a refueling and repair station. No matter who owns Schwerin, there will always be shady dealings here. Crowds of idle, frenzied crew members wander its corridors while their spacecrafts are being repaired. Corporate spies try to legitimize their presence through Schwerin. Fortune seekers who have earned a few dignitas in the Belt asteroid mines try to find more lucrative work here. Schwerin is always facing away from the Sun, in every sense.

Tortuga of the 23rd century, built by the pirates themselves. In the hard days after the Great Anarchist Revolution (VAR), the asteroid became a refuge for all those who did not want to work honestly for the benefit of free humanity. All sorts of scum went here, and while the hexarchy was creating the ancap system, crime and violence nested here. At least, that's how it's presented in the films produced by the many film companies owned by AnCom.

Hargeisa is the gathering point for all illegal groups in the Main Belt and the Outer System.

The second station on Interamnia, besides Hargeisa. Once the Voyage Terminal and the property of the Tianming Corporation, today it is a challenge prize between the pirates and the system corporation. When the latter is in charge, the anti-piracy center intercepts spacecrafts arriving in Hargeisa, and when the pirates or the Civil Resistance are at the helm, temporary peace is established on the asteroid.
Civil Resistance HIS David went here from Bastion Oracle. Red Throne on Hecate is the main base of Civil Resistance.
