We need to escort it to the safe location on the station and protect it from attacks by %VICTIM_NAME%.
%BENEFICIARY_NAME% has called us for a specific purpose: <color=#FFFEC1>escort the Duke</color> to safety at %STATION_NAME%. Quasimorphs will send the best warriors into battle, so be careful.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Escort the Duke of %BENEFICIARY_NAME% to the safe location.

The envoys of %BENEFICIARY_NAME% conveyed to us the praise of the <color=#FFFEC1>Duke</color> and called for the expansion of allied relations. If we work for the future winner now, we will take a worthy place in the future new hierarchy of the Solar System.

<color=#FFFEC1>Details:</color> %BENEFICIARY_NAME% has long held %STATION_NAME%. Presumably, the station is built into some kind of system that allows quasimorphs to stay in physical reality. %VICTIM_NAME% has long been waging war against its quasimorphic enemies and is ready to attack %STATION_NAME%. Its target is the <color=#FFFEC1>reliquary</color>. %BENEFICIARY_NAME% will be grateful to us if we protect it.
%VICTIM_NAME% is already attacking %STATION_NAME%. We need to <color=#FFFEC1>protect the reliquary</color>. Eliminate the attackers before they destroy the artifact.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> You need to <color=#FFFEC1>protect the reliquary</color> - a quasimorphic artifact similar to a statue or obelisk.
The meeting with quasimorphs from %BENEFICIARY_NAME% took place. The cargo has been received. <color=#FFFEC1>Creepy</color> creatures, but I think I'm starting to get used to them.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Eliminate all groups of quasimorphs who came for the <color=#FFFEC1>igvalite</color>.

Details: %BENEFICIARY_NAME% has held %STATION_NAME% for a long time. However, it is now under attack from %VICTIM_NAME%.

We have recognized the signature of an Igvalite coming from the station. It is a quasimorphic artifact capable of accumulating gavvakh. It seems that %BENEFICIARY_NAME% is using this place to store energy.

We can eliminate the groups of quasimorphs of %VICTIM_NAME% who have come for igvalite. Let's do this, and the reward from the new owners of the Solar System will be extremely high.

Several groups of quasimorphs from %VICTIM_NAME% have already infiltrated %STATION_NAME%. You need to find them and eliminate them before they take over the igvalite. %BENEFICIARY_NAME% is ready to give out a really good reward for this rock.

How did we even get into this, Boss?
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Eliminate all groups of quasimorphs who came for the <color=#FFFEC1>igvalite</color>.
The meeting with quasimorphs from %BENEFICIARY_NAME% took place. This is a good deal: a rock that is useless to us in exchange for something that actually works.

Details: Enemies of Tezctlan, which are much more dangerous than people, have appeared in the Solar System. Those who do not understand that the time of the Red and Gold Empire of the Sun has passed. Only one empire has a future: the Emerald Empire.

%STATION_NAME% is in the hands of the rebel %VICTIM_NAME%. These upstarts must be expelled from physical reality forever, which will become an inexhaustible source of gavvakh only for Tezctlan, the true master of the Solar System.

We don't know how some quasimorphs remain in our reality, while the majority are always attracted by their bramfaturas. I want to say that %STATION_NAME% is simply teeming with warriors of %VICTIM_NAME%. Sensors show that they are aware of the attack and are waiting for your arrival.

Proceed methodically, do not take unnecessary risks. Kill enough and the survivors will run. Upon completion of the mission, as soon as you leave the facility, Tezctlan will send his duke.

Servants of <color=#FFFEC1>Tezctlan</color> are settling in at %STATION_NAME%. Soon <color=#FFFEC1>Tezctlan</color> will become the master of the Solar System. He transferred something extremely valuable to Magnum.

<color=#FFFEC1>Details:</color> %VICTIM_NAME% captured %STATION_NAME%. <color=#FFFEC1>Tezctlan</color> wants the rebels to be taught a lesson. At the moment, the <color=#FFFEC1>Duke</color> is preparing quasimorphs for an attack on the objects of the Emerald Empire. Its <color=#FFFEC1>death</color> will please the King of Gannix.

We'll drop you off wherever we can. <color=#FFFEC1>Kill the Duke</color>. Don't try to be a hero and clear out the entire %STATION_NAME%. Don't take unnecessary risks, save your strength. I send the target location to your map. Good luck.
<color=#FFFEC1>Tezctlan</color> showed pleasure when he learned about the results of our work. His gift for our obedience awaits us in Magnum’s cargo hold.

Details: Tezctlan lifted the veil of mystery about why the quasimorphs of the Bramfatura of Venus are able to remain in physical reality for a long time.

In the past, the King of Gannix learned to bind his energy to a physical object that serves as an object of worship - a reliquary. And somehow %VICTIM_NAME% stole the secret from the Master. At %STATION_NAME% there is a reliquary that gives them the ability to linger in our world.

We will give pleasure to Tezctlan if we destroy this quasimorphic artifact.

What the sensors show is impossible to believe. This <color=#FFFEC1>reliquary</color>... it just shines! %STATION_NAME% is literally swarming with quasimorphs. Show %VICTIM_NAME% how people fight. Let's prove our usefulness to <color=#FFFEC1>Tezctlan</color>.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> find and destroy the <color=#FFFEC1>reliquary</color> - a quasimorphic artifact similar to a statue or obelisk.

The quasimorphs of %VICTIM_NAME% at %STATION_NAME% resemble bees in a disturbed hive. The time will soon come to strike again here. <color=#FFFEC1>Tezctlan</color> is extremely pleased with our work. We received one of Gannix's artifacts as a gift from the Master.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Pick up the <color=#FFFEC1>igvalite</color> at %STATION_NAME% and evacuate with it.

Details: %VICTIM_NAME% firmly holds %STATION_NAME%. This angers Tezctlan. He wants to torture future slaves.

The servants of the King of Gannix told us that there is an igvalite at %STATION_NAME%. A special entity that is similar to a mineral. The Igvalite is capable of accumulating gavvakh - the energy that powers quasimorphs.

If we want to serve the future owner of the Solar System, we must get this mineral for him.

The signature of igvalite has been found, its location is marked on the map. We'll try to drop you off as close to the location as possible, but we can't promise anything: the shuttle pilot is already reporting strange visions.

Move through %STATION_NAME% carefully, save your strength. %VICTIM_NAME% will certainly defend igvalite with special zeal.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Pick up the <color=#FFFEC1>igvalite</color> at %STATION_NAME% and evacuate with it.
The meeting with one of the servants of <color=#FFFEC1>Tezctlan</color> took place. We gave him <color=#FFFEC1>igvalite</color>, they gave us a gift from the Emerald King as a reward.

Details: %BENEFICIARY_NAME% needs our services. Their %STATION_NAME% is being attacked by %VICTIM_NAME%. Both groups of quasimorphs not only know how to linger in physical reality, but have also learned to bypass the SBN filters and constantly transmit messages to the network. Each faction considers itself the true master of the Solar System.

An attack on the station can begin at any moment, and if we want to improve relations with %BENEFICIARY_NAME%, then we should hurry.

As soon as we get you there, the attack will begin. Sensors show that hostile quasimorphs have already appeared in certain areas of %STATION_NAME%. <color=#FFFEC1>Hold out as long as possible</color>, their onslaught will certainly weaken.
The reward from %BENEFICIARY_NAME% is already on Magnum. If we can hold off even %VICTIM_NAME%, does that mean we can destroy them? And is it worth doing this for the sake of other quasimorphs?
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Escort the Duke of %BENEFICIARY_NAME% to the safe location.

Details: %VICTIM_NAME% is preparing to attack %STATION_NAME%. However, it has been turned into a real fortress by %BENEFICIARY_NAME%. The rightful owners of the Solar System will not give up so easily. And %VICTIM_NAME% understands this. It seems it is planning to eliminate the Duke of %BENEFICIARY_NAME%.

The Quasimorphs call on their loyal servants to fulfill their sacred duty. If we want to strengthen relations with %BENEFICIARY_NAME%, we must take on the role of the Duke's personal guard.

We need to escort it to the safe location on the station and protect it from attacks by %VICTIM_NAME%.
%BENEFICIARY_NAME% has called us for a specific purpose: <color=#FFFEC1>escort the Duke</color> to safety at %STATION_NAME%. Quasimorphs will send the best warriors into battle, so be careful.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Escort the Duke of %BENEFICIARY_NAME% to the safe location.

The envoys of %BENEFICIARY_NAME% conveyed to us the praise of the <color=#FFFEC1>Duke</color> and called for the expansion of allied relations. If we work for the future winner now, we will take a worthy place in the future new hierarchy of the Solar System.

<color=#FFFEC1>Details:</color> %BENEFICIARY_NAME% has long held %STATION_NAME%. Presumably, the station is built into some kind of system that allows quasimorphs to stay in physical reality. %VICTIM_NAME% has long been waging war against its quasimorphic enemies and is ready to attack %STATION_NAME%. Its target is the <color=#FFFEC1>reliquary</color>. %BENEFICIARY_NAME% will be grateful to us if we protect it.
%VICTIM_NAME% is already attacking %STATION_NAME%. We need to <color=#FFFEC1>protect the reliquary</color>. Eliminate the attackers before they destroy the artifact.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> You need to <color=#FFFEC1>protect the reliquary</color> - a quasimorphic artifact similar to a statue or obelisk.
The meeting with quasimorphs from %BENEFICIARY_NAME% took place. The cargo has been received. <color=#FFFEC1>Creepy</color> creatures, but I think I'm starting to get used to them.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Eliminate all groups of quasimorphs who came for the <color=#FFFEC1>igvalite</color>.

Details: %BENEFICIARY_NAME% has held %STATION_NAME% for a long time. However, it is now under attack from %VICTIM_NAME%.

We have recognized the signature of an Igvalite coming from the station. It is a quasimorphic artifact capable of accumulating gavvakh. It seems that %BENEFICIARY_NAME% is using this place to store energy.

We can eliminate the groups of quasimorphs of %VICTIM_NAME% who have come for the igvalite. Let's do this, and the reward from the new owners of the Solar System will be extremely high.

Several groups of quasimorphs from %VICTIM_NAME% have already infiltrated %STATION_NAME%. You need to find them and eliminate them before they take over the igvalite. %BENEFICIARY_NAME% is ready to give out a really good reward for this rock.

How did we even get into this, Boss?
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Eliminate all groups of quasimorphs who came for the <color=#FFFEC1>igvalite</color>.
The meeting with quasimorphs from %BENEFICIARY_NAME% took place. This is a good deal: a rock that is useless to us in exchange for something that actually works.

Details: Corporations have switched to an open terrorist dictatorship. They use the chaos that has arisen in the Solar System to strengthen the power of financial capital.

Apparently, the capitalists of %VICTIM_NAME% are preparing for a punitive operation against the workers of their own %STATION_NAME%. The Civil Resistance sends active signals that they are ready to save people from further oppression and take power into their own hands. We can help, but not for the sake of the happiness of the working people: the CR will not remain in debt.

The task is simple: eliminate everyone who able to hold a weapon and evacuate before this place becomes another branch of hell. Colnodes will appear when we are no longer at %STATION_NAME%.

%STATION_NAME% is at your complete disposal. The enemy is known: their own <color=#FFFEC1>Security Service</color> or <color=#FFFEC1>PMC</color>, hired by the capitalists %VICTIM_NAME%. They will leave this place as soon as several fighters are missing.

The capitalists %VICTIM_NAME% staged a real hysteria in the SBN on the topic of terrorism and violation of laws. They needed to think before they decided to break the backbone of the working people.

By the way, the colnodes delivered aboard Magnum the cargo due to us for participating in the liberation movement.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Find and eliminate the high-ranking manager of the capitalists %VICTIM_NAME%.

Details: People from the Civil Resistance contacted us. Comrades say that the capitalists %VICTIM_NAME% have recently particularly distinguished themselves in the field of oppression of the working class.

So, one of their satraps is organizing an attack on the liberated CR stations and colonies. They are currently located at %STATION_NAME%. We can help the rebels by eliminating this person. At the same time, let's test the strength of the defense of the capitalists %VICTIM_NAME%.

Do not burden yourself with the responsibility for the fight against the anarcho-capitalist regime of the System, Boss. Let's work for a reward: the warehouses of the CR are full of goods expropriated from corporations.

Good news: the target is at %STATION_NAME%. Moderate resistance is expected from the <color=#FFFEC1>Security Service</color> of the capitalists %VICTIM_NAME% or the <color=#FFFEC1>PMCs</color> working for them. There's no difference, is there? <color=#FFFEC1>If you eliminate the target, come back</color>. And try not to get too distracted by exploring %STATION_NAME%, this is not our priority task.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Find and eliminate the high-ranking manager of the capitalists %VICTIM_NAME%.

The capitalists %VICTIM_NAME% began an information campaign about the need to completely eradicate terrorism in the System. They may want to strike back in retaliation. Why don't we take on this job then?

A group of colnodes delivered a reward to Magnum for the work done. Fortunately, they have already set sail: looking into their empty eyes can be unbearable.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Destroy the communications equipment of the capitalists %VICTIM_NAME%.

Details: %VICTIM_NAME% has firmly integrated %STATION_NAME% into its financial structure. Thanks to this asset, it managed to gain a foothold in this part of the System. The Civil Resistance has been keeping this place under its radar for a long time. The rebels would like to turn %STATION_NAME% into their own base of operations.

There is one sure way to prepare the space station for invasion. If you deal a blow to the communication system of %STATION_NAME%, which ensures its work with the rest of the structural elements of the corporation, then the capitalists %VICTIM_NAME% will be forced to loosen their grip. The rebels will be grateful if we strike.

The location of the communication center is marked on your map. Don't be surprised that it's far enough away from you - they used countermeasures. This means that the security of %STATION_NAME% has already been raised by alarm. Nothing unusual: local Security Service and possibly PMC.

First destroy the transmitter, the rest depends on the circumstances.
You need to <color=#FFFEC1>find and destroy the transmitter</color>. It is a satellite dish aimed into space. There is a mark on your map.

%STATION_NAME% has been excluded from %VICTIM_NAME% structure for some time. The <color=#FFFEC1>Civil Resistance</color> thanks us for our solidarity and hopes for our eventual joining in their struggle. Valuable cargo from the rebels is already on Magnum.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Pick up the prototype of the new invention at %STATION_NAME% and evacuate with it.

Details: the Civil Resistance has long been fighting against the anarcho-capitalist regime of the System. However, individual actions are not enough to win. It wants to build up its own assets and start production.

Rebel agents have found out that at %STATION_NAME% the engineers of the capitalists %VICTIM_NAME% are creating new equipment. If we steal the prototype, CR will not have to start from scratch. We can help the cause of liberation of the working class by completing this task.

%STATION_NAME% has an unusual signature. 99.9% probability that this is the prototype needed by the <color=#FFFEC1>Civil Resistance</color>. We'll drop you off as close to your target as possible. Make your way through the security, <color=#FFFEC1>take the device, and return</color>. If you decide to look for something unusual at %STATION_NAME%, make sure it's worth the risk.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task</color>: pick up the prototype of  the new invention and return with it to Magnum.
The exchange took place. The colnodes of the <color=#FFFEC1>Civil Resistance</color> left us some property. We exchange the worst for the bad, of course, but this is honest work.

For almost a hundred years now, the Civil Resistance has been waging a desperate struggle against corporations. Humanity is enslaved. The heroic efforts of the rebels, without support and without supplies, sometimes seem simply meaningless. By the way, about supplies.

We have at our disposal an information package, from which it follows that there are valuable items at %STATION_NAME%. This is what the CR is missing to intensify actions in this region of the Solar System. The capitalists %VICTIM_NAME% clearly have no use for them.

We can help the rebels if we organize a movable property operation.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task</color>: find and pick up valuable items on each floor of the station. Smash and destroy everything you want, but take the goods. After that, evacuate.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> On each floor of %STATION_NAME%, pick up valuable items, then evacuate.
The capitalists %VICTIM_NAME% will have to deal with the destruction we caused at %STATION_NAME% for a long time. The colnodes took the junk and gave us some equipment.

Details: The time has come to speak out against the oppressors of the working people. Today we will not allow those who deprived us of our Motherland to take away %STATION_NAME%.

%VICTIM_NAME% is actively posting messages in the SBN about the inadmissibility of further stay of terrorists of the Civil Resistance at the station. This is a signal for us and other honest citizens of the Solar System.

The task is simple: take a defensive position and kill as many corporate mercenaries as possible, discouraging them from seizing the station.

When the job is done, %STATION_NAME% will be free from capitalist oppression. Our comrades promise to reward our efforts well.

%STATION_NAME% is at your complete disposal. Most of the equipment here is stuff taken from corporations. If you take something for yourself, the colnodes won't mind. <color=#FFFEC1>Hold out</color> as long as possible, the onslaught of the mercenaries will certainly weaken.

%VICTIM_NAME% is conducting a massive information campaign to save its reputation after a failed attack on %STATION_NAME%. The reward from comrades from the <color=#FFFEC1>Civil Resistance</color> is already on board Magnum.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Escort the key colnode to the safe location.

<color=#FFFEC1>Details:</color> the <color=#FFFEC1>Civil Resistance</color> has long held %STATION_NAME%. This place is a bastion of struggle against corporate oppressors. However, this is precisely what attracted the attention of %VICTIM_NAME%. It prepared an operation to eliminate the <color=#FFFEC1>key colnode</color> - one of the commanders of the <color=#FFFEC1>CR</color>. We can help our comrades in their fight if we escort them to the safe location at %STATION_NAME%.
You need to <color=#FFFEC1>escort the key colnode</color> to the location marked on the map.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Escort the key colnode to the safe location.
Let everyone see that %VICTIM_NAME% is not able to eliminate the colnode, that it is losing its grip. I wouldn’t be surprised if we soon stumble upon an order against the capitalist %VICTIM_NAME%.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Protect the supply warehouse of the <color=#FFFEC1>Civil Resistance</color>.

Details: the Civil Resistance has strengthened its position at %STATION_NAME%. The comrades carried out several successful operations against the capitalists from here. However, the latest raid on %VICTIM_NAME% was a mistake. Corporation analysts tracked the raiders' path to %STATION_NAME%. And now the CR is preparing for defense. We must prevent corporate henchmen from destroying the resources collected here.

If we help the rebels protect the supplies, we will not only receive their respect, but also some of the salvaged equipment.

The location of the supply depot is marked on your map. Sabotage groups will infiltrate %STATION_NAME% as they overcome the anti-space defenses. Eliminate them and don’t let them destroy what they earned with such difficulty.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Protect the supply warehouse of the <color=#FFFEC1>Civil Resistance</color>.

%VICTIM_NAME% is already spreading information about its unprecedented success in the fight against terrorism. Of course, they cannot provide evidence. This is why the <color=#FFFEC1>Civil Resistance</color> will win sooner or later. The ancap system needs to feed less on its own propaganda.

Details: Recently, %STATION_NAME% has been the main center of operations for the Civil Resistance. The rebels carried out several extremely successful operations against %VICTIM_NAME%. The CR agents learned that the capitalists %VICTIM_NAME% were preparing an operation to extract information from %STATION_NAME%. The target will be the PCPU of the colnode commander.

If we want to help the rebels, we must eliminate all of the corporation's infiltration teams.

The <color=#FFFEC1>Civil Resistance</color> has turned %STATION_NAME% into a kind of fortress. Despite this, some of the attackers will still pass through the anti-space defenses. Find them and eliminate them. This will serve as a good lesson for anyone who believes that the working class has lost the will to resist.
%VICTIM_NAME% is forced to find another way to learn about the plans of the <color=#FFFEC1>Civil Resistance</color>. I think that events around %STATION_NAME% are only gaining momentum.

Details: the Civil Resistance takes advantage of the chaos of the new redistribution of property. The rebels began sabotage, murder, and espionage against the enemies of the working people throughout the Solar System.

%STATION_NAME% is now the target of so-called "direct actions". That is, capture. This is where we come into the game.

Simple task: we go in, eliminate everyone capable of holding weapons, and leave until this place becomes another branch of hell. The colnodes will defend the station from counterattacks without us. The Unchained Belt has already sent all available pirate crews to protect %STATION_NAME%.

By the way, I almost forgot. Capturing a station always pays well. And trusting relationships with comrades from the Civil Resistance will not hurt us.

10 seconds until landing. As soon as the pirates guarding %STATION_NAME% realize that the battle is lost, they will retreat or lay down their arms. It is enough to destroy 50% of the combatants.

Keep your eyes open! If you understand that you have enough strength and resources, you can explore this place. Apart from the capture, nothing else is included in the contract, that is, the customer will accept %STATION_NAME% in any condition. Colnodes don't get to choose.

The <color=#FFFEC1>Unchained Belt</color> frets and fumes. Pirates have lost an extremely convenient station for intercepting corporate spacecrafts. The colnodes have already delivered our reward to Magnum for the participation in the liberation of the working class.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Find and eliminate the commander of the pirate crew.

Details: Capitalist anarchy reigns in the Solar System, controlled by NCE. However, groups that are not part of the ancap system live in real hell.

Now %STATION_NAME% is in the hands of pirates. Their commander is known for their cruelty not only towards corporations, but also towards the working people. The Civil Resistance asks for our help in carrying out a punitive action against this beast.

The elimination of an experienced pirate commander will be a message to the Unchained Belt that It's better not to get involved with the rebels.

We were given the target's personal signature. The sensors clearly show the commander among the rest of the personnel at %STATION_NAME%. The pirates can put up good resistance, but they can also run away in all directions, depending on your luck. <color=#FFFEC1>If you eliminate the target, come back</color>. Try not to get too distracted exploring %STATION_NAME%, it's not our priority.
<color=#FFFEC1>Target</color>: commander of the pirate crew. He will shoot back, so be prepared.
Another enemy of the working class has been killed. And so it will be with everyone who dares to violate the will of the working people! The colnodes delivered the promised reward to Magnum.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Destroy the pirate resource warehouse on %STATION_NAME%.

Details: Unfortunately, it's not just corporations that are oppressing the working class. Ignorant elements who do not understand the importance of self-organization and collective spirit are organizing criminal gangs and wasting human potential in vain.

Right now, at %STATION_NAME%, pirates have set up a resource warehouse. The liaison of the Civil Resistance invites us to destroy it so that some of the pirates will think: is the protection offered by the Unchained Belt worth it? If people have nothing to eat, perhaps they will join the rebels. There is even a recruitment point nearby.

We have marked the location of the warehouse on your map. Don't expect to be dropped off too close. The warehouse is hidden quite reliably in the depths of %STATION_NAME%. We need to find and <color=#FFFEC1>destroy a mountain of boxes</color>. You are allowed to be distracted from the main task only if you have found something really important.
You need to find and <color=#FFFEC1>destroy the pirate warehouse</color>. It is a mountain of boxes. You yourself have seen them many times in the cargo hold of Magnum.
Great job, <color=#FFFEC1>Boss</color>. The colnodes prepared and sent valuable cargo to Magnum as a reward.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Pick up the pirate <color=#FFFEC1>PCPU</color> from %STATION_NAME% and evacuate with it.

<color=#FFFEC1>Details:</color> Lately, %STATION_NAME% has been the main center of operations for one extremely annoying pirate crew. Many raids organized from here were carried out against the <color=#FFFEC1>Civil Resistance</color>. The rebels would do well to know about the pirates' future plans. This can be arranged: we infiltrate %STATION_NAME%, find the <color=#FFFEC1>PCPU</color> with pirate plans (sorry, not a treasure map), and the <color=#FFFEC1>CR</color> will be forced to exchange data for something useful to us.

The sensors found a <color=#FFFEC1>PCPU</color> clogged with data. However, the pirates at %STATION_NAME% have already been alerted. We'll try to get you as close to the target as possible. <color=#FFFEC1>Take the device and come back</color>. Only distract yourself with something else if the risk is worth it.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Pick up the pirate <color=#FFFEC1>PCPU</color> from %STATION_NAME% and evacuate with it.

The Unchained Belt ordered the crew of %STATION_NAME% to change all operational plans. They suspect that the beneficiary is the Civil Resistance. If the pirates decide to take revenge, it will be possible to accept a contract from them as well.

The CR liaison took the PCPU and gave us the reward, it's already on the spacecraft.

For almost a hundred years, the Civil Resistance has been waging a desperate struggle against corporations. Humanity is enslaved. However, there are people who have left the ancap system and still show the highest degree of ignorance. Pirate crews are hindering the cause of the resistance. However, they can also be used in the fight against the enslavers of the working people.

We have at our disposal an information package, from which it follows that %STATION_NAME% contains valuable items. The rebels just lack them to intensify actions in this region of the Solar System. We can help them if we organize a movable property transaction.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task</color>: find and pick up valuable items on each floor of the station. Smash and destroy everything you want, but take the goods. After that, evacuate.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> On each floor of %STATION_NAME%, pick up valuable items, then evacuate.

The pirate crew running %STATION_NAME% will have to deal with the destruction we caused there for a long time. The colnodes took the junk that we carried out for them. In return they gave us some equipment.

Details: It seems that the Unchained Belt should only be a problem for corporations, but pirates are not averse to profiting from the Civil Resistance. %STATION_NAME% is now the target of so-called "direct actions" by pirates. Yes, we are talking about capture.

The CR sends announcements about rewards for participation in the defense of %STATION_NAME%. Simple task: we land at the place specified by the customer and kill the pirates until they retreat.

It is necessary to <color=#FFFEC1>take a defensive position</color> and hold out until the attackers give up trying to storm the station. Remember that boarding is common for pirates. It might not be easy. Collateral damage shouldn't worry us. We have one mission: to ensure that %STATION_NAME% remains in the hands of the <color=#FFFEC1>Civil Resistance</color> when the dust settles and the smoke clears.

The rebels retained control of %STATION_NAME%. Direct actions proved to be a losing strategy for the <color=#FFFEC1>Unchained Belt</color>. This means that the pirates will now turn to murder, espionage, and sabotage. That is, there will be work for us soon. In the meantime, a cargo from the rebels arrived on Magnum in gratitude for the protection.

Details: %STATION_NAME% has long been in the hands of the Civil Resistance. The rebels organized one of their field headquarters here in order to systematically disturb all the enemies of the working people in this part of the Solar System. This does not suit both the corporations and the pirate crews.

The pirates placed a contract for the PMC to elminate the commander of %STATION_NAME%. We can take a contract from the CR to protect them. Not the most rewarding job, but a good way to improve relations with the rebels.

The target signature transmitted by the colnodes is marked on your map. Escort the commander to the specified location at %STATION_NAME%. Move from level to level until you are safe. Pirates are experienced boarders, so be careful. Exploring %STATION_NAME% is not included in the task list, but if you see something interesting, act according to the circumstances.
Escort is a routine job. <color=#FFFEC1>Your task</color>: escort the colnode commander to the safe location specified by the <color=#FFFEC1>Civil Resistance</color>.

The <color=#FFFEC1>Civil Resistance</color> is extremely grateful for saving the life of an experienced commander. Colnode, who commanded the loading of the reward onto Magnum, scared me even more than usual. I don't like working with them.

<color=#FFFEC1>Details:</color> the <color=#FFFEC1>Civil Resistance</color> and the <color=#FFFEC1>Unchained Belt</color> hate each other as much as they hate corporations. A group of colnodes holding %STATION_NAME% asks us to help protect the resource warehouse. For some reason, the pirates are trying to destroy it, sparing no effort and time.

We deciphered the sensor data and marked the location of the cargo on your map. Sabotage groups will infiltrate %STATION_NAME% as they overcome the anti-space defenses. Eliminate them all and <color=#FFFEC1>do not let the cargo be destroyed</color>.
You need to <color=#FFFEC1>defend the warehouse</color> of the <color=#FFFEC1>Civil Resistance</color>. It is a mountain of boxes. You yourself have seen them many times in the cargo hold of Magnum.
Great job, <color=#FFFEC1>Boss</color>. The colnodes prepared and sent valuable cargo to Magnum as a reward.

Details: Recently, %STATION_NAME% has been the main center of operations of the Civil Resistance against pirate crews. Colnodes learned that agents of the Unchained Belt had located this place and were preparing a spy operation. The pirates' target will be the PCPU with important data. If the device is stolen, the rebels will have to redo all operational and strategic plans.

If we want to receive a reward for this contract, we must eliminate all the pirate infiltration teams that will come for the PCPU.
It is necessary to prevent infiltration of %STATION_NAME% by destroying all groups of pirates. They are notorious for their excellent boarding teams. I believe in you, but be careful.

The <color=#FFFEC1>Unchained Belt</color> is forced to look for another way to find out about the plans of the colnodes. We have already received our reward, but it seems that events around this station are only gaining momentum.

Boss, pirate crews are attacking %STATION_NAME%, regardless of their losses. Looks like the <color=#FFFEC1>Unchained Belt</color> really needs something at this station. A group of defending comrades from the <color=#FFFEC1>Civil Resistance</color> requests assistance. If we respond, we will need to provide the pirate teams with a decent greeting: hold back their attacks until reinforcements from the <color=#FFFEC1>CR</color> arrive.
%VICTIM_NAME% throws squad after squad into battle. You need to <color=#FFFEC1>hold out</color> until the <color=#FFFEC1>colnods</color> arrive.
The colnodes will have to deal with the mess that the pirates created at %STATION_NAME% for a long time. We also took part in this, but received a reward.

Details: More and more quasimorphic events are happening throughout the Solar System. All such cases are presented by the corporation as fakes of the Civil Resistance. The rebels got in touch with us and urge us not to believe the lies of the corporations. They want to recruit us to recapture %STATION_NAME% from the quasimorphs. After our victory, they will look there for evidence of the existence of quasimorphs in order to provide them to all of humanity.

Here is what we will need to do: walk through %STATION_NAME% and kill as many quasimorphs as possible. These creatures act on behalf of %VICTIM_NAME% and it is unknown how they learned to linger in physical reality for a long time.

We don't know why exactly these quasimorphs remain in our reality. As a rule, the quasimorphosis subsides soon after the violence stops. But %VICTIM_NAME% has learned to overcome this limitation. You'll have to work manually.

After disembarking, methodically move forward through %STATION_NAME% and shoot everything that moves. Keep your eyes open and try to be prepared for any turn of events. Good luck.
A large number of colnodes are arriving at %STATION_NAME%. We got what we were due: the cargo is already on Magnum.

Details: the Civil Resistance has become active around %STATION_NAME%. They want to get this place, but are not yet ready for direct actions. They can be understood: %STATION_NAME% is in the hands of %VICTIM_NAME%. They somehow learned to linger in our reality for a long time. We can test the strength of their defenses.

The rebels found out that a quasimorph of the Duke type was seen at %STATION_NAME%. If we manage to eliminate it, then the forces of this faction here will be significantly weakened.

Of course, we are not doing this to save humanity. The customer indicated that the PMC that undertakes this work will receive a good reward.

The sensors are almost completely blind: we observe unimaginable leaps of quasimorphosis. We'll drop you off wherever we can. <color=#FFFEC1>Kill the Duke</color>. Don't try to be a hero and clear out the entire %STATION_NAME%, it's not in the contract.

The <color=#FFFEC1>Civil Resistance</color> is not at all interested in details. The colnode, who was in touch with us, nodded barely and hung up. I hope the reward that awaits us in Magnum's cargo hold was worth the effort.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Pick up the <color=#FFFEC1>igvalite</color> at %STATION_NAME% and evacuate with it.

Details: the Civil Resistance is conducting operations related to %STATION_NAME%. Despite the suppression of information by the Hexarchy, it is known that this place is in the hands of %VICTIM_NAME%. The rebels discovered something interesting there.

The agents picked up the signature of an igvalite - a quasimorphic artifact capable of accumulating gavvakh. It appears that the quasimorphs use this location to store energy. We have work to do.

The CR offers to infiltrate %STATION_NAME% and pick up the igvalite.

The signature of igvalite has been found, its location is marked on your map. Move through %STATION_NAME% carefully, save your strength. The rebels are really ready to reward you well for this rock.

We will try to drop you off as close to the place as possible, but we can’t promise anything: the shuttle pilot reports strange visions.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Pick up the <color=#FFFEC1>igvalite</color> at %STATION_NAME% and evacuate with it.

The meeting with the <color=#FFFEC1>Civil Resistance</color> colnode took place. Seeing them gives me the uncanny valley effect. It's good that they got off Magnum. We received a valuable cargo in exchange for a useless rock.

For almost a hundred years now, the Civil Resistance has been waging a desperate struggle against corporations. Humanity is enslaved. But recently, a new source of hope for the rebels has appeared in the Solar System. We are talking about %VICTIM_NAME%. %STATION_NAME% has been captured by these monsters. And this is an unexpected trump card for the CR in the fight against corporations.

If we manage to steal valuable goods from the quasimorphs, the rebels will use them against capitalists.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task</color>: find and pick up valuable items on each floor of the station. Smash and destroy everything you want, but take the goods. After that, evacuate.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> On each floor of %STATION_NAME%, pick up valuable items, then evacuate.

The quasimorphs from %VICTIM_NAME% clearly did not expect such a raid. We managed to quickly leave %STATION_NAME% before the quasimorphosis began to affect Magnum. The colnodes took the junk that we carried out for them. In exchange, they handed over some equipment expropriated from corporations.

Details: Due to its status as the public enemy, the Civil Resistance cannot directly report that %STATION_NAME% is about to be attacked by %VICTIM_NAME%.

Our analysts revealed this information with the help of the quasimorphs themselves. They have learned to bypass the SBN filters and constantly transmit messages to the network. The Hexarchy immediately declares them fakes.

If we want to improve relations with the CR, then we should help them repel the attack.

As soon as we get you there, the attack will begin. Sensors show that quasimorphs have already appeared in certain places of %STATION_NAME%. <color=#FFFEC1>Hold out</color> for a while, and their onslaught will weaken. It seems that they are not omnipotent either.

The reward from the <color=#FFFEC1>Civil Resistance</color> is already on Magnum. %STATION_NAME% will be removed from the market for some time. But people, whatever they may be, are still better than quasimorphs. Right?
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Escort the key colnode to the safe location.

Details: The headquarters of the Civil Resistance key colnode is located at %STATION_NAME%. Recently, they have carried out several successful operations against quasimorphs. And now %VICTIM_NAME% is about to attack the station.

If we take on this urgent contract, we need to bring the key colnode to the safe location.

Escort the colnode to the specified location at %STATION_NAME%. Move from level to level until you are safe. Exploring %STATION_NAME% is not included in the task list, but if you see something interesting, act according to the circumstances.
Another day, another mission against the quasimorphs. <color=#FFFEC1>Your task</color>: escort the key colnode to the safe location.
As a reward for saving the key colnode, the <color=#FFFEC1>Civil Resistance</color> sent us a valuable parcel of equipment expropriated from corporations. The cargo is already on board Magnum.

<color=#FFFEC1>Details:</color> the <color=#FFFEC1>Civil Resistance</color> has seriously strengthened at %STATION_NAME%. Comrades carried out several successful operations from here against %VICTIM_NAME%. However, the monsters gathered for a counterattack. The rebels report that the target will be the station's server equipment. If we want to get a reward, we need to <color=#FFFEC1>prevent the quasimorphs from destroying the computer</color>.
The server location is marked on your map. The quasimorphs are already at %STATION_NAME%. Eliminate them all. The <color=#FFFEC1>equipment must survive</color>.
It turns out that %VICTIM_NAME% is not omnipotent at all. Sooner or later, not only corporate, but also spiritual oppressors will be expelled from the Solar System.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Eliminate the group of quasimorphs from %VICTIM_NAME% before the <color=#FFFEC1>ritual</color> is completed.

<color=#FFFEC1>Details:</color> Lately, surges in quasimorphosis have been felt at %STATION_NAME%. The liaison officer of the <color=#FFFEC1>Civil Resistance</color> told us about this. The colnodes are asking for help. Apparently, this bramfatura activity attracted %VICTIM_NAME% here. They have captured part of the station and are preparing to hold some kind of <color=#FFFEC1>ritual</color> there. You need to get to them and eliminate them before they finish. The <color=#FFFEC1>Civil Resistance</color> promises a worthy reward for help.

It will not be possible to drop you off close to the ritual site. At %STATION_NAME% there has been a real massacre for several days. We'll have to hurry. The quasimorphs must be stopped before the ritual is completed.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Eliminate the group of quasimorphs from %VICTIM_NAME% before the <color=#FFFEC1>ritual</color> is completed.

The <color=#FFFEC1>Civil Resistance</color> colnodes have already transferred the reward to Magnum. It seems that calm times will not come to the Solar System very soon. How many corporations and factions are there fighting for dominance and survival?

Here is what we will need to do: walk through %STATION_NAME% and kill as many quasimorphs as possible. These creatures act on behalf of %VICTIM_NAME% and it is unknown how they learned to linger in physical reality for a long time.

Details: Feathered Masks are looking for anyone who will help them capture %STATION_NAME% in order to turn this place into another bastion of fight against Tezctlan.

%VICTIM_NAME% holds on to this piece of metal as if it were the greatest of treasures. Let's crush them, and Xiomara will be pleased with the fulfillment of the contract.

Even if analysts of %VICTIM_NAME% are expecting an attack from <color=#FFFEC1>Xiomara</color>, the appearance of a trained operative <color=#FFFEC1>PMC</color> here will be a surprise to them. Act according to the situation, but remember that great causes require great cruelty.
<color=#FFFEC1>Xiomara</color> is pleased with our work. %STATION_NAME% now resembles Pandemonium. A gift from her appeared in Magnum's cargo hold. It's worth testing this artifact in action.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Find and eliminate the security officer of %VICTIM_NAME%.

Details: Feathered Masks were forced to join the fight for the Solar System. The fact that the Hexarchy hides the existence of quasimorphs plays into our hands. Xiomara and her rebel order can slowly move through the System.

Now the lady's gaze is directed towards %STATION_NAME%. Feathered Masks say that there is a factor there that prevents the capture of this place. They report an energetic and courageous warrior fighting on the side of the people. Our analysts studied the personnel of %VICTIM_NAME% and came to the conclusion that she is talking about an employee of the local security service.

Xiomara will be extremely pleased if we kill this great warrior .

The shuttle will land wherever it can. %STATION_NAME% security team is using countermeasures, so we have to maneuver. Sensors show that personnel occupy positions according to the combat schedule. Make a massacre, but <color=#FFFEC1>eliminate the target</color>. We will prove to <color=#FFFEC1>Xiomara</color> that we are worthy of serving.
Request of <color=#FFFEC1>Feathered Masks</color>: eliminate the security officer of %VICTIM_NAME%. Their location is marked on your map.

Xiomara is pleased with our work. %VICTIM_NAME% is in turmoil; additional forces have been deployed to %STATION_NAME%. Maybe it's time to hit it somewhere else?

Feathered Masks gave us a worthy reward, the artifact has already been delivered to Magnum.

Details: Xiomara prepares to lead the Order of Feathered Masks into battle against Tezctlan. We must keep our part of the contract and serve her whenever possible.

One of her dukes conveyed to us a message about Xiomara's interest in %STATION_NAME%. There is a device here that detects mysterious voices from space. Xiomara wants it destroyed before she sends her servants to take over the station.

Our analysts have examined this asset of %VICTIM_NAME%. Apparently, we are talking about a normal communication system. If we get to the transmitter and destroy it, Xiomara will be happy. For a while.

We'll try to throw you closer to the <color=#FFFEC1>transmitter</color>, but you'll have to walk part of the way on your own. It won't be easy: according to sensors, the security of %VICTIM_NAME% is ready for an attack. The good news is that the communication center is clearly visible, and I marked it on your map. Show them what war is, remind them who paved the way for corporations to freedom.
You need to <color=#FFFEC1>find and destroy the transmitter</color>. It is a satellite dish aimed into space. There is a mark on your map.

%STATION_NAME% is now completely blinded and stunned. We have created great difficulties for %VICTIM_NAME%. <color=#FFFEC1>Feathered Masks</color> are satisfied with our work. They are planning to take over this station in the near future. The reward is already on Magnum.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Get to the ritual site and protect it.

Details: One of the reasons why Tezctlan tried to eliminate Xiomara is the knowledge that allows her and Feathered Masks maintain contact with physical reality. She stole the secret from the King of Gannix after his return from Earth. To maintain existence in the physical world, an influx of gavvakh, reliquaries, and regular rituals that extract energy from the bramfaturas of the planets are necessary.

Xiomara senses that on %STATION_NAME% the influence of the bramfatura has reached its peak. It's time for the ritual. However, %VICTIM_NAME%, which controls the station, stands in the way.

Feathered Masks call on all available forces to ensure the Duke has the opportunity to perform the sacred ceremony. We have to hold the defense until the ritual is completed.

<color=#FFFEC1>Xiomara</color> cannot wait, the ritual must be completed at any cost. %STATION_NAME% is under the control of %VICTIM_NAME%, and it will not retreat without a fight. Your task is to make your way to the ritual site and <color=#FFFEC1>hold your position</color> until the end. You have to hold out.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Get to the ritual site and protect it.
Good job. <color=#FFFEC1>Feathered Masks</color> will be able to operate in this part of the Solar System and beyond. The quasimorphs have already transferred the reward to Magnum.

Details: %BENEFICIARY_NAME% firmly holds %STATION_NAME%. This bastion of theirs in physical reality is evidence that the Solar System is returning under the control of its ancient masters. However, people have not yet understood which side to take.

%BENEFICIARY_NAME% wants us to defend %STATION_NAME% from the attack of %VICTIM_NAME%. It needs a bright event to advertise in the SBN. Of course, the corporation will not say that it seized the asset from the quasimorphs, it will lie about the Civil Resistance. Our task: to make sure that it won't get what it wants.

The attackers have already penetrated the perimeter of %STATION_NAME%. We have not yet understood whether it is <color=#FFFEC1>Security Service</color> or <color=#FFFEC1>PMC</color>. But it shouldn't make much difference to you. We'll drop you off in the main strike zone. As soon as you find your feet, <color=#FFFEC1>take up defensive position</color>. Sooner or later the attackers will retreat, you just need to hold out for enough time.

%STATION_NAME% was and remains a symbol that the order of the Solar System has changed forever. The <color=#FFFEC1>Hexarchy</color> will not be able to hide the truth forever. Lying will not help them when %BENEFICIARY_NAME% strikes back. A valuable gift from her arrived on Magnum, which will greatly help us in the future.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Escort the Duke of %BENEFICIARY_NAME% to the safe location.

Details: %VICTIM_NAME% has launched activities around %STATION_NAME%. However, the station is in the hands of %BENEFICIARY_NAME%. The rightful owners of the Solar System will not give up so easily. And %VICTIM_NAME% understands this. It seems that it is preparing an action to eliminate the Duke of %BENEFICIARY_NAME%.

The quasimorphs call on their faithful servants to fulfill their sacred duty. If we want to strengthen our relationship with %BENEFICIARY_NAME%, we must take on the role of the Duke's personal guard. We need to escort it to the safe location on the station and protect it from attacks by fighters of %VICTIM_NAME%.

%BENEFICIARY_NAME% has called us for a specific purpose: <color=#FFFEC1>escort the Duke to safety</color> at %STATION_NAME%. Corporations send their best fighters into battle against quasimorphs, so save your strength.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Escort the Duke of %BENEFICIARY_NAME% to the safe location.

The envoys of %BENEFICIARY_NAME% conveyed to us the praise of the <color=#FFFEC1>Duke</color> and called for the expansion of allied relations. If we work for the future winner now, we will take a worthy place in the future new hierarchy of the Solar System.

<color=#FFFEC1>Details:</color> %BENEFICIARY_NAME% has long held %STATION_NAME%. Presumably, the station is built into some kind of system that allows quasimorphs to stay in physical reality. %VICTIM_NAME% found out about this and decided to attack. Its target is the <color=#FFFEC1>reliquary</color>. %BENEFICIARY_NAME% will be grateful to us if we protect it.
Mercenaries from %VICTIM_NAME% are already attacking %STATION_NAME%. You need to <color=#FFFEC1>protect the reliquary</color>. Eliminate the attackers before they destroy the artifact.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> You need to <color=#FFFEC1>protect the reliquary</color> - a quasimorphic artifact similar to a statue or obelisk.
The meeting with quasimorphs from %BENEFICIARY_NAME% took place. The cargo has been received. <color=#FFFEC1>Creepy</color> creatures, but I think I'm starting to get used to them.

Details: %VICTIM_NAME% conducts operations related to %STATION_NAME%. The object has long been in the hands of %BENEFICIARY_NAME%.

We have recognized the signature of an igvalite emanating from the station. It is a quasimorphic artifact capable of accumulating gavvakh. It seems that %BENEFICIARY_NAME% is using this place to store energy.

We can get here before the attackers and eliminate the infiltration teams of %VICTIM_NAME%. If we do this, the future owners of the Solar System will be extremely generous.

Several infiltration teams from %VICTIM_NAME% have already infiltrated %STATION_NAME%. You need to find them and eliminate them before they take over the igvalite. The quasimorphs are ready to give out a really good reward for this rock.

I hope we chose the right side, Boss.
The meeting with quasimorphs from %BENEFICIARY_NAME% took place. This is a good deal: a rock that is useless to us in exchange for something that actually works.

Details: Xiomara has seriously taken up the task of establishing order in the Solar System. Now she is looking for anyone who will help the Feathered Masks capture %STATION_NAME% to continue the fight against Tezctlan.

%VICTIM_NAME% holds on to this metal piece of matter as if it were the greatest of treasures. Let's expel them from physical reality, and Xiomara will thank us.

We don't know how some quasimorphs remain in our reality, while the majority are always attracted by their bramfaturas. I want to say that %STATION_NAME% is simply teeming with warriors of %VICTIM_NAME%. Sensors show that they are aware of the attack and are waiting for your arrival.

Proceed methodically, do not take unnecessary risks. Kill enough and the survivors will run. Upon completion of the mission, as soon as you leave the facility, Xiomara will send her duke.

Servants of <color=#FFFEC1>Xiomara</color> are settling in at %STATION_NAME%. <color=#FFFEC1>Feathered Masks</color> are pleased with our success. They transferred something extremely valuable to Magnum.

<color=#FFFEC1>Details:</color> Quasimorphs have captured %STATION_NAME%. <color=#FFFEC1>Xiomara</color> wants her enemies to be taught a lesson. <color=#FFFEC1>The Duke</color> of %VICTIM_NAME% is currently located in this location. They prepare the quasimorphs to attack the bases of the <color=#FFFEC1>Feathered Masks</color>. Their <color=#FFFEC1>elimination</color> is a good way to please <color=#FFFEC1>Xiomara</color>.

We'll drop you off wherever we can. <color=#FFFEC1>Kill the Duke</color>. Don't try to be a hero and clear out the entire %STATION_NAME%. Don't take unnecessary risks, save your strength. I send the target location to your map. Good luck.
<color=#FFFEC1>Xiomara</color> is pleased with the result of our work. A gift for our obedience awaits in the Magnum's cargo hold.

Details: Xiomara has lifted the veil of mystery about why the quasimorphs of Feathered Masks are able to remain in physical reality for a long time. They have learned to bind their energy to a special reliquary, which serves as another object of worship.

It seems that somehow the quasimorphs of %VICTIM_NAME% have taken possession of this secret and can remain in our world . There is a reliquary at %STATION_NAME% that gives them this ability. We can help Feathered Masks if we destroy this quasimorphic artifact.

What the sensors show is impossible to believe. This <color=#FFFEC1>reliquary</color>... it just shines! %STATION_NAME% is literally swarming with quasimorphs. Show %VICTIM_NAME% how people fight. Let's prove our usefulness to <color=#FFFEC1>Xiomare</color>.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> find and destroy the <color=#FFFEC1>reliquary</color> - a quasimorphic artifact similar to a statue or obelisk.

The quasimorphs of %VICTIM_NAME% at %STATION_NAME% resemble bees in a disturbed hive. The time will soon come to strike again here. <color=#FFFEC1>Feathered Masks</color> are extremely pleased with our work. We received one of the artifacts as a gift from <color=#FFFEC1>Xiomara</color>.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Pick up the <color=#FFFEC1>igvalite</color> at %STATION_NAME% and evacuate with it.

Details: %VICTIM_NAME% firmly holds %STATION_NAME%. Xiomara senses the presence of an extremely important thing there, which will help her in the fight for the Solar System.

The Warriors of the Feathered Masks told us that there is an igvalite on %STATION_NAME% - a mineral-like entity. It is able to accumulate gavvakh - energy that powers quasimorphs. If we want to serve Xiomara, we must get her this igvalite.

The signature of the igvalite has been found, its location is marked on the map. We'll try to drop you off as close to the location as possible, but we can't promise anything: the shuttle pilot is already reporting strange visions.

Move through %STATION_NAME% carefully, save your strength. %VICTIM_NAME% will certainly defend the igvalite with special zeal.
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Pick up the <color=#FFFEC1>igvalite</color> at %STATION_NAME% and evacuate with it.
The meeting with the warriors of <color=#FFFEC1>Feathered Masks</color> took place. We gave them the <color=#FFFEC1>igvalite</color>, they gave us a gift from <color=#FFFEC1>Xiomara</color>.

Details: %BENEFICIARY_NAME% needs our services. Their %STATION_NAME% is being attacked by %VICTIM_NAME%. Both groups of quasimorphs not only know how to linger in physical reality, but have also learned to bypass the SBN filters and constantly transmit messages to the network. Each faction considers itself the true master of the Solar System.

An attack on the station can begin at any moment, and if we want to improve relations with %BENEFICIARY_NAME%, then we should hurry.

As soon as we get you there, the attack will begin. Sensors show that hostile quasimorphs have already appeared in certain areas of %STATION_NAME%. <color=#FFFEC1>Hold out as long as possible</color>, their onslaught will certainly weaken.
The reward from %BENEFICIARY_NAME% is already on Magnum. If we can hold off even %VICTIM_NAME%, does that mean we can destroy them? And is it worth doing this for the sake of other quasimorphs?
<color=#FFFEC1>Task:</color> Escort the Duke of %BENEFICIARY_NAME% to the safe location.

We can eliminate the groups of quasimorphs of %VICTIM_NAME% who have come for the igvalite. Let's do this, and the reward from the new owners of the Solar System will be extremely high.

Even if the personnel of %STATION_NAME% are expecting an attack by <color=#FFFEC1>Feathered Masks</color>, the appearance of a trained operative <color=#FFFEC1>PMC</color> here will be a surprise to them. Act according to the situation, be careful.
<color=#FFFEC1>Xiomara</color> is pleased with our work. %STATION_NAME% now resembles Pandemonium. A gift from her appeared in Magnum's cargo hold. It's worth testing this artifact in action.

Details: Feathered Masks are gradually joining the fight for the Solar System. They perceive people as allies or a source of gavvakh. And it would be better for us to be the first.

Now Xiomara is interested in %STATION_NAME%, which is in the hands of %VICTIM_NAME%. Feathered Masks believe that there is a factor preventing the capture of this place. They talk about "a great warrior defending a place of power." Our analysts studied the station and came to the conclusion that we are talking about the commander of the station’s defense.

Xiomara will be extremely pleased if we eliminate this warrior.

The shuttle will land wherever it can. %VICTIM_NAME% is using countermeasures on %STATION_NAME%, so we have to maneuver. Sensors show that personnel occupy positions according to the combat schedule. Carry out a massacre, but get to the <color=#FFFEC1>commander</color> of these psychos. Let's make <color=#FFFEC1>Xiomara</color> happy!

Xiomara is pleased with our work. %VICTIM_NAME% is in turmoil; additional forces have been deployed to %STATION_NAME%. Maybe it's time to hit them in another place?

Xiomara gave us a worthy reward, the artifact is already on Magnum.

Details: Feathered Masks are gradually joining the fight for the Solar System. We have more and more opportunities to serve the Mistress. She shows interest in %STATION_NAME%.

%VICTIM_NAME% placed there what the quasimorphs called an Altar of Knowledge. The Feathered Masks need this device destroyed before they go to capture %STATION_NAME%. Apparently, we are talking about some kind of computer, which %VICTIM_NAME% uses for an unknown purpose. If we destroy it, Xiomara will be favorable to us.

We will try to throw you closer to the <color=#FFFEC1>computer</color>. It won't be easy: sensors show that the station's defenders are already preparing for an attack. The good news is that the location of the computer at %STATION_NAME% is also clearly visible, and I have marked it on your map. Did they choose to be public enemies? Show them the consequences of such a decision.

Without a server, %VICTIM_NAME% has no chance of holding %STATION_NAME%. Somehow, the quasimorphs gradually learn about the sensitive infrastructure of people.

Xiomara is pleased with our work. She transferred something special from her arsenal to Magnum.
